loans.name: Galinda Mercedes

texts.es:
Galinda Mercedes tiene 41 años, es soltera vive con los hijos de 15 y 10 años, vive en el Recinto El Progreso Perteneciente al Cantón Chillanes.

Los miembros de la V.R.C EL PROGRESO, está ubicada a 15 minutos de la oficina en Chillanes, esta constituida por 13 socios es el tercer crédito que solicitan a la cooperativa, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican a la agricultura siembran cacao, maiz, platano, soya y yuca.


Galinda Mercedesse dedica a la agricultura siembra cacao, maíz, plátano, soya y yuca, ademas se dedica a la crianza de ganado. Las compras las realiza en Chillanes y San Pablo y las vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.

El crédito le ayudará en la compra de insumos, fertilizantes y abonos para los cultivos y alimentación para las ganado, el crédito le apoyado de manera que han incrementado la producción de los cultivos. Ha enfrentado desafíos como enfermedades de los trabajadores y las plagas y enfermedades en los cultivos. Su sueño es comprar mas terreno para seguir cultivando y comprar mas ganado.

Le gusta ir al rio con los hijos a tomar un baño.
texts.en:
Galinda Mercedes, 41, is single living with her children who are 15 and 10 years of age in El Progreso that belongs to Chillanes Canton.

The members of the “El Progreso” (Progress) communal bank are located 15 minutes from the Chillanes office.  There are 13 members and this is their third loan request to the cooperative.  The members of this communal bank are cocoa bean, corn, banana, soya and manioc farmers.

Galinda Mercedes farms cocoa beans, corn, banana, soya and manioc; she also raises livestock.  She makes her purchases in Chillanes and in San Pablo and her sales take place in the Chillanes Sunday market.

The loan will help her buy farming supplies, fertilizer and manure for the crops and feed for the livestock.  The loan has helped her in that she increased crop yields.  She has faced challenges like illness among her laborers and infestations and illnesses in the crops.  Her dream is to buy more land to continue farming and to buy more livestock.

She enjoys bathing in the river with her children.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies, fertilizer, manure and animal feed.

loans.name: Alicia

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “REYNA DE LOS ANGELES DE URQUILLOS”; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Urquillos en la Provincia de Calca y Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Alicia; la socia tiene 39 años de edad, la socia es casada; La socia se dedica a la compra y venta de verduras y a la agricultura; la socia tiene sus terrenos de cultivo de maíz blanco y ella produce choclos, los cuales son vendidos en ferias y en la ciudad de Cusco; la socia también vende verduras en el mercado en Urubamba y ahora que comenzaron la siembras de maíz y verduras ella necesita comprar semillas de maíz blanco y de verduras para sembrar, la socia requiere el préstamo para invertir en la compra de semillas para la plantación en la siembra de maíz blanco y de verduras.

La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Alicia, 39, is a member of the “Reyna de Los Angeles de Urquillos” communal bank which is located in Urquillos District in Calca Province and Cusco Department.

She is married.  She’s a farmer and vegetable merchant.  She has fields planted with white corn and she produces corn on the cob that are sold at markets and in the city of Cusco.  She also sells vegetables in the Urubamba market and now that planting season for corn and vegetables has begun she needs to buy white corn seeds and vegetable seeds to plant.  She needs the loan to buy seeds to plant her white corn and vegetables crops.

She is grateful for the support she’ll get and commits to make her installment payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy white corn seeds and vegetable seeds.

loans.name: Lucia Birmania

texts.es:
Lucia Birmania tiene 51 años, es casada vive con el esposo y con los hijos, vive en el Recinto El Progreso Perteneciente al Cantón Chillanes.

Los miembros de la V.R.C EL PROGRESO, está ubicada a 15 minutos de la oficina en Chillanes, esta constituida por 13 socios es el tercer crédito que solicitan a la cooperativa, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican a la agricultura siembran cacao, maiz, platano, soya y yuca.


Lucia Birmania se dedica a la agricultura siembra cacao, maíz, plátano, soya y yuca. Las compras las realiza en Chillanes y San Pablo y las vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.

El crédito le ayudará en la compra de insumos, fertilizantes y abonos, el crédito le apoyado de manera que han incrementado la producción de los cultivos. Ha enfrentado desafíos como enfermedades de los trabajadores y las plagas y enfermedades en los cultivos. Su sueño es  construir la casa para vivir con la familia.

Le gusta caminar con los hijos.
texts.en:
Lucia Birmania, 51, is a member of the “El Progreso” (Progress) communal bank which is located in El Progreso belonging to Chillanes Canton.

The members of the El Progreso communal bank are located fifteen minutes from the Chillanes office.  The communal bank has 13 members and this is their third loan request to the cooperative.  The members of this communal bank farm cocoa beans, corn, bananas, soya and manioc.

Lucia Birmania farms cocoa beans, corn, bananas, soya and manioc.  She makes her purchases in Chillanes and in San Pablo and her sales take place in the Chillanes Sunday market.

The loan will help her buy supplies, fertilizer and manure.  The loan has helped her in that she’s increased crop yields.  She has faced challenges like illness among her laborers and infestations and illnesses in the crops.  Her dream is to build a house to live in with her family.

She enjoys going for walks with her children.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies, fertilizer and manure.

loans.name: Las Maravillas Group

texts.es: La Sra. Marcia  es conviviente, tiene 29 años D. edad y  tiene 2 hijos en edad escolar, actualmente es integrante en la alcancía comunal “Las Maravillas” grupo  conformado por 11 socios que se dedican a diversas actividades D. comercio. Marcia   trabaja desD. hace  6  años en la venta D. comida y jugos en un puesto en el M., este negocio surge a raíz D.  que sus hijos empezaron el colegio, y además el  sueldo D. su esposo no alcanzaba para cubrir los gastos D. educación, alimentación y D. servicios, Y es así que Marcia consiguió un capital y puso su jugueria y con el tiempo empezó a vender comida, Marcia nos cuenta que nada fue fácil tuvo que trabajar muy duro para conseguir lo que hoy en día tiene, gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación a logrado mejores ingresos económicos, sus hijos van al colegio  , y sobre todo su familia cuenta con una  mejor calidad D. vida, con el fin D. seguir creciendo a solicitado un nuevo préstamo para comprar insumos (frutas, arroz, fideos para la elaboración D. la comida ). Sabemos que Marcia  cumplirá sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los préstamos D. Edaprospo le ayudaran.
texts.en: Marcia, 29, lives with her partner and has 2 school-aged children.  She is currently a member of the communal bank “Las Maravillas."  This group has 11 members who have a variety of different retail businesses.  For 6 years, Marcia has been working selling food and juices from a post in the market.  This business was started to pay for her children's educational expenses and also to help with the household expenses such as food and utilities, which her husband's salary does not completely cover.  Martha got together some capital and set up her juice business, and over time she also started to sell food.  Marcia tells us that it wasn't easy; she had to work very hard to get where she is today.  Thanks to her effort and dedication she has managed to have a better income, her children go to school, and most of all her family can have a better quality of life.  Martha has a goal of continuing to grow her business, and to do this she is requesting a new loan to buy supplies (such as fruit, rice, and noodles) to make her dishes.  We know that Marcia will achieve her goals with a lot of work and effort, and the loans from Edaprospo will help her.

loans.use: to buy supplies (rice and fruit) to make food to sell

loans.name: Katty Alexandra

texts.es:
Katty Alexandra tiene 37 años, es soltera vive con la  hija de 12 años, vive en el Recinto El Progreso Perteneciente al Cantón Chillanes.

Los miembros de la V.R.C EL PROGRESO, está ubicada a 15 minutos de la oficina en Chillanes, esta constituida por 13 socios es el tercer crédito que solicitan a la cooperativa, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican a la agricultura siembran cacao, maiz, platano, soya y yuca.
  

Katty se dedica a la agricultura siembra cacao, maíz, plátano, soya y yuca. Las compras las realiza en Chillanes y San Pablo y las vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.

El crédito le ayudará en la compra de insumos, fertilizantes y abonos, el crédito le apoyado de manera que han incrementado la producción de los cultivos. Ha enfrentado desafíos como enfermedades de los trabajadores y las plagas y enfermedades en los cultivos. Su sueño es tener buena salud para seguir trabajando y tener casa propia.

Le gusta ir los domingos a misa con los hijos.
texts.en:
Katty Alexandra, 37, is single living with her 12-year-old daughter in El Progreso belonging to Chillanes Canton.

The members of the El Progreso communal bank are located fifteen minutes from the Chillanes office.  The communal bank has 13 members and this is their third loan request to the cooperative.  The members of this communal bank farm cocoa beans, corn, bananas, soya and manioc.

Katty farms cocoa beans, corn, bananas, soya and manioc.  She makes her purchases in Chillanes and in San Pablo and her sales take place in the Chillanes Sunday market.

The loan will help her buy supplies, fertilizer and manure.  The loan has helped her in that she’s increased crop yields.  She has faced challenges like illness among her laborers and infestations and illnesses in the crops.  Her dream is to be in good health to continue working and have a house of her own.

She enjoys attending Sunday Mass with her children.

loans.use: to buy supplies, fertilizer and manure.

loans.name: Ablawa

texts.fr:
Ablawa est une femme âgé(e) de 24 ans. Elle est célibataire. 
Ablawa travaille comme revendeuse de produits de beauté (mèches, tissages) depuis 2009. Elle vend à toutes personnes. Elle achète les produits à Lomé 
Ablawa a requis son premier cycle de prêt à WAGES afin d’acheter des mèches, des tissages.
texts.en: Ablawa is a 24-year-old woman who is unmarried. She has been working as a seller of beauty products (hair extensions, weaves) since 2009. She sells to anyone. She purchases her products in Lomé, the capital of Togo. Ablawa has requested her first loan cycle with WAGES in order to buy hair extensions and weaves.

loans.use: to buy beauty products and hair extensions

loans.name: Irene

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “REYNA DE LOS ANGELES DE URQUILLOS”; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Urquillos en la Provincia de Calca y Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Irene; la socia tiene 70 años de edad, la socia es viuda; La socia tiene 5 hijos; la socia de dedica a la compra y venta de verduras  y a la agricultura como primera actividad económica, la socia requiere en esta oportunidad el crédito para invertir en la compra de semillas de maíz blanco para el nuevo cultivo, la socia no produce verduras por lo que ella tiene que comprar de otras personas que le dejan en partes, ella paga la primera parte y le van dando poco a poco las verduras para que estas no se le malogren luego la socia les paga al cabo de un mes. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de semillas de maíz y el pago final a su proveedor de verduras como zanahoria, tomate, y verduras en general.

La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Irene, 70, is a member of the “Reyna de Los Angeles de Urquillos” communal bank located in Urquillos District in Calca Province and Cusco Department.

She is a widow and has five children.  She is a vegetable merchant and a farmer; these are her main economic activities.  On this occasion she needs the loan to buy white corn seeds for the new crops.  She does not produce vegetables so she has to buy them from others who let her get them in parts.  She pays the first part and then they gradually resupply her with vegetables so that they don’t spoil.  A month later she pays them.  She is asking for the loan to buy corn seeds and to make the final payment to her vegetable supplier for carrots, tomatoes and vegetables in general.

She is grateful for the support she’ll get and at the same time commits to make her installment payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy corn seeds.

loans.name: Afi

texts.fr: Afi est une femme  âgé(e) de 47ans. Elle est veuve. Elle a 03 enfants. Afi travaille comme revendeuse de produits alimentaires (riz, sucre, huile végétale) depuis 2003. Elle vend à toutes personnes. Elle achète les produits au marché d’Assiyéyé et au Grand Marché de Lomé. Afi a requis son deuxième cycle de crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter 02 paniers de tomates fraiches, 02 bidons d’huile, 02 cartons de lait, 01 sac du sucre et des denrées alimentaires.
texts.en:
Afi is 47 years old, a widow, and the mother of 3 children. She has worked as a retailer of food products (rice, sugar, vegetable oil) since 2003. She buys her products at the Assiyéyé market and at the grand market of Lomé.

Afi has asked for a second loan from Wages in order to buy 2 baskets of fresh tomatoes, 2 barrels of oil, 2 boxes of milk, 1 bag of sugar, and food items.

loans.use: to buy general grocery products.

loans.name: Angel Misael

texts.es:
Angel Misael tiene 28 años, es casado vive con la esposa y los hijos de 10 y 3 años, vive en el Recinto El Progreso Perteneciente al Cantón Chillanes.

Los miembros de la V.R.C EL PROGRESO, está ubicada a 15 minutos de la oficina en Chillanes, esta constituida por 13 socios es el tercer crédito que solicitan a la cooperativa, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican a la agricultura siembran cacao, maiz, platano, soya y yuca.

Angel se dedica a la agricultura siembra cacao, maiz, platano, soya y yuca. Las compras las realiza en Chillanes y San Pablo y las vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.

El crédito le ayudará en la compra de insumos, fertilizantes y abonos para los cultivos, el crédito le apoyado de manera que han incrementado la producción de los cultivos. Ha enfrentado desafíos como enfermedades de los trabajadores y las plagas y enfermedades en los cultivos. Su sueño es tener buena salud para seguir trabajando y educar a los hijos.

En los tiempos libres le gusta palir de paseo con los hijos.
texts.en:
Angel Misael, 28, is married and lives with his wife and children, aged 10 and 3.  He lives in the Recinto El Progreso, which belongs to the Chillanes canton.  

There are 13 members of the rural communal bank "El Progreso," which is located 15 minutes from the office in Chillanes.  This is the third loan that they have requested.  The members of this group are farmers who specialize in short cycle agriculture cultivating cocoa, corn, bananas, soybeans and cassava.

Angel is a farmer who cultivates cocoa, corn, bananas, soybeans and cassava.  He makes his purchases in Chillanes and San Pablo, and he sells his produce in the Sunday market in Chillanes.

This loan will help him to buy supplies for his crops such as fertilizers and manure, which will help him to increase the productivity of his croplands.  He has confronted challenges such as diseases and pests that affect his crops and illnesses that affect his workers.  His dream is to have good health so that he can continue to work and education his children.

In his free time he enjoys going for walks with his children.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as fertilizers and manure

loans.name: Maria Elena

texts.es:
Maria Elena tiene 41 años, es soltera vive con la  hija casada, con el esposo y un nieto, vive en el Recinto El Progreso Perteneciente al Cantón Chillanes.

Los miembros de la V.R.C EL PROGRESO, está ubicada a 15 minutos de la oficina en Chillanes, esta constituida por 13 socios es el tercer crédito que solicitan a la cooperativa, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican a la agricultura siembran cacao, maiz, platano, soya y yuca.

Maria Elena se dedica a la agricultura siembra cacao, maíz, plátano, soya y yuca, ademas se dedica a la crianza de aves. Las compras las realiza en Chillanes y San Pablo y las vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.

El crédito le ayudará en la compra de insumos, fertilizantes y abonos para los cultivos y alimentación para las aves, el crédito le apoyado de manera que han incrementado la producción de los cultivos. Ha enfrentado desafíos como enfermedades de los trabajadores y las plagas y enfermedades en los cultivos. Su sueño es tener mas terreno para cultivar.

Le gusta jugar con el nieto en el parque.
texts.en:
María Elena, 41, is single living with her married daughter, her husband and a grandson in El Progreso belonging to Chillanes Canton.

The members of the El Progreso communal bank are located fifteen minutes from the Chillanes office.  There are 13 members and this is their third loan request to the cooperative.  The members of this communal bank farm cocoa beans, corn, banana, soya and manioc.

María Elena farms cocoa beans, corn, bananas, soya and manioc; she also raises barnyard fowl.  She makes her purchases in Chillanes and San Pablo and her sales take place at the Chillanes Sunday market.

The loan will help her buy supplies, fertilizer and manure for the crops and feed for the fowl.  The loan has helped her in that she’s increased crop yields.  She has faced such challenges as illnesses among her field hands and infestations and illnesses in her crops.  Her dream is to have more farmland.

She enjoys playing in the park with her grandson.

loans.use: to buy supplies, fertilizer and manure for the crops and feed for the fowl.

loans.name: Manuel Andres

texts.es:
Manuel Andres tiene 47 años, es casado vive con la esposa y los 4 hijos de 15, 14, 10 y 3 años, vive en el Recinto El Progreso Perteneciente al Cantón Chillanes.

Los miembros de la V.R.C EL PROGRESO, está ubicada a 15 minutos de la oficina en Chillanes, esta constituida por 13 socios es el tercer crédito que solicitan a la cooperativa, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican a la agricultura siembran cacao, maiz, platano, soya y yuca.

Manuel se dedica a la agricultura siembra cacao, maiz, platano, soya y yuca  en tierras propias. Las compras las realiza en Chillanes y San Pablo y las vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.

El crédito le ayudará en la compra de insumos, fertilizantes y abonos para los cultivos, el crédito le apoyado de manera que han incrementado la producción de los cultivos. Ha enfrentado desafíos como enfermedades de los trabajadores y las plagas y enfermedades en los cultivos. Su sueño es comprar un vehiculo para salir a pasear con la familia.

En los tiempos libres le gusta salir con la esposa a caminar.
texts.en:
Manuel Andrés, 47, is married living with his wife and four children who are 15, 14, 10 and 3 years of age in El Progreso belonging to Chillanes Canton.

The members of the El Progreso communal bank are located fifteen minutes from the Chillanes office.  There are 13 members and this is their third loan request to the cooperative.  The members of this communal bank farm cocoa beans, corn, banana, soya and manioc.

Manuel farms cocoa beans, corn, bananas, soya and manioc. He makes his purchases in Chillanes and San Pablo and his sales take place at the Chillanes Sunday market.

The loan will help him buy supplies, fertilizer and manure for the crops.  The loan has helped him in that he’s increased crop yields.  He has faced such challenges as illnesses among his field hands and infestations and illnesses in his crops.  His dream is to buy a vehicle to go out on excursions with his family.

In his spare time he enjoys going for walks with his wife.

loans.use: to buy supplies, fertilizer and manure for his crops.

loans.name: Videkon 2 Group

texts.fr: VIDEKON 2 est un groupement composé de seize personnes qui vivent toutes dans le même quarter au Bénin. C’est la première fois que ce groupe sollicite un crédit auprès de ALIDé, afin d’élever le niveau de leur activité et de mieux répondre aux exigences de leur clientèle. La représentante du groupe du nom de Pierrette est celle qui a la main levée sur la photo. Pierrette est âgée de 42 ans et est mariée à un certain Félix. Le couple a trois enfants, tous scolarisés ; et un autre enfant à leur charge. Les charges de la famille sont supportées de façon conjointe par Pierrette et son mari. Pierrette  n'est pas allée à l'école. Pour assurer les besoins de ses enfants, Pierrette vend des tissus et des mèches depuis trois ans par le système de distribution. Pierrette achète ses produits au Togo et au Bénin. Ce crédit permettra certainement à Pierrette et à son groupement VIDEKON 2 de rehausser leur activité et d'accroître leur chiffre d'affaires et leur revenu.
texts.en: The Videkon 2 group comprises 16 people who all live in the same area in Benin. This is the first time this group is seeking a loan through ALIDÉ, in order to raise the level of their business and better respond to the demands of their clientele. The group representative, named Pierrette, is the one with the raised hand in the photo. Pierrette is 42 years old and married to a man named Félix. The couple have three children, all of whom are in school; they also have an additional child in their care. Pierrette and her husband together provide for the family. To meet her children's needs, Pierrette has been selling fabric and hair extensions for three years through the local distribution system. She gets her products in Togo and in Benin. This loan will certainly allow her and her group, Videkon 2, to enhance their business and increase their sales and income.

loans.use: To buy pagnes (brightly-printed West African clothing) and hair extensions.

loans.name: Ever Jose

texts.es:
Ever esta casado  y hombre honesto, su esposa es costurera y sus hijos están estudiando. Su proyecto es seguir mejorando la infraestructura de la vivienda. Para ofreciéndole a sus hijos mayor comodidad. Desde  hace tiempo trabajar en una empresa privada  El préstamo será utilizado para la compra de materiales de construcción: cemento, arena, láminas de zinc, golosas, perlines entre otros para cambiar el techo y repellar las paredes de la casa. 

Agradece a la institución por el apoyo al desarrollo  de mejorar su nivel de vida y a la seguridad de su familia.
texts.en:
Ever is married and is an honest man, and his wife works as a dressmaker, and their children are in school.  HIs project is to continue making improvements on the infrastructure of his home to provide his children with greater comfort. For a while he has worked for a private company.  This loan will be used to buy construction materials such as: cement, sand, corrugated metal roofing material, beams, etc. to change the roof and plaster the walls of the house.

He is grateful to the institution for the support  to help him improve his living standard and his family's safety.

loans.use: to buy construction materials to put on a new roof.

loans.name: Irene

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “REYNA DE LOS ANGELES DE URQUILLOS”; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Urquillos en la Provincia de Calca y Departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Irene; la socia tiene 54 años de edad, la socia es casada; La socia tiene 1 hijo; la socia se dedica a la agricultura como actividad principal, la socia alterna su actividad económica con la venta de verduras ella vende tomate, zanahoria, cebollas, lechuga; la socia requiere en esta oportunidad el crédito para invertir en la compra de semillas de maíz blanco para el nuevo cultivo, la socia solicita crédito para invertir en la compra de maíz para la siembra. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de semilla de maíz para la siembra.

La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Irene is a member of the "Reyna de los Ángeles de Urquillos" community bank which is located in Urquillos district, in Calca province, in Cusco department.

Irene is 54 years old, married, and has one child.  Her main business activity is farming.  She also sells vegetables (tomatoes, carrots, onions and lettuce).  On this occasion, Irene needs a loan to invest in buying white corn seeds to grow.

Irene is grateful for the support that she is receiving and pledges to make her repayments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to invest in buying corn seed to sow

loans.name: Luz Elena

texts.es:
Luz Elena tiene 63 años, es soltero vive solo no tiene hijos, vive en el Recinto El Progreso Perteneciente al Cantón Chillanes.

Los miembros de la V.R.C DIVINO NIÑO, está ubicada a 20 minutos de la oficina en Chillanes, esta constituida por 10 socios es el tercer crédito que solicitan a la cooperativa, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican a la agricultura siembran cacao, maiz y platano, ademas se decicana a la comercializacion de granos secos.


Luz Elena  se dedica a la agricultura siembra cacao, maíz, plátano, soya y yuca, ademas se dedica a la crianza de aves. Las compras las realiza en Chillanes y San Pablo y las vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.

El crédito le ayudará en la compra de insumos, fertilizantes, el crédito le apoyado de manera que han incrementado la producción de los cultivos. Ha enfrentado desafíos como enfermedades de los trabajadores y las plagas y enfermedades en los cultivos. Su sueño es comprar un vehiculo para el trabajo.

Le gusta ser una persona responsable y festejar las fiestas de San Rita.
texts.en:
Luz Elena, 63, is single and has no children. She lives in El Progreso belonging to Chillanes Canton.

The members of the “Divino Niño” (Divine Child) communal bank are located twenty minutes from the Chillanes office.  It has ten members and this is their third loan request from the cooperative.  The members of this communal bank farm cocoa beans, corn and bananas; they are also dry grain merchants.

Luz Elena farms cocoa beans, corn, banana, soya and manioc; she also raises barnyard fowl.  Her purchases take place in Chillanes and San Pablo and sales take place in the Chillanes Sunday market.

The loan will help her buy supplies and fertilizer.  The loan has helped in in such a way that crop yields have increased.  She has faced challenges like illness among her field hands and infestations and illnesses in the crops.  Her dream is to buy a vehicle for work.

She enjoys being a responsible person and celebrating the feast days of Saint Rita.

loans.use: to buy supplies and fertilizer.

loans.name: Felipe

texts.es:
El Sr Felipe es casado, posee casa propia con todas las comodidades necesarias de un hogar, tiene 61 años de edad, el mismo es maestro civil de obras cuenta con 15 años de antigüedad en el rubro lo que le permite contar con muy buena clientela e ingresos.
El se considera una persona responsable y trabajadora, toda su vida ha trabajado y no tiene temor a seguir haciéndolo. Todo lo que hace es por tratar de ganar mas ingresos, para de esa forma poder tener una vida decorosa y sin privaciones, ya que es una persona ya mayor.
El solicita el credito para la compra de herramientas que le va a servir en el ejercicio de su profesión.
texts.en:
Sr. Felipe is married and has his own residence with all the comforts of home. He is 61 years old and a master builder with 15 years of experience in his field. This allows him to have a good customer base and an income. He considers himself to be a responsible and a hardworking person. Felipe has worked his entire life and is not afraid of continuing forward. All of his efforts are channeled into earning more income so that he can have a decent life and be free from want since he is an older individual.

The loan he is requesting will be used to buy tools that he needs to perform his job.

loans.use: to purchase tools for his job.

loans.name: Espérance

texts.fr: Espérance est âgée de 48 ans et est mariée à un topographe du nom de Athanase. Le couple a quatre enfants. Aucun des enfants n'est scolarisé et ne vit avec elle. Espérance vit seule et assure seule ses différentes charges. Pour y arriver, Espérance vend depuis neuf ans environs des produits vivriers dans un marché du Bénin. Espérance s'approvisionne au Bénin. C’est la deuxième fois que Espérance sollicite un crédit auprès de ALIDé, en vue d’élever le niveau de son activité et d’accroître son chiffre d’affaires et son revenu.
texts.en: Espérance is 48 years old and married to a surveyor named Athanase. The couple have four children. None of the children attend school, and none live with her. Espérance lives alone and provides for herself. To achieve this, she has sold various food items at a market in Benin for nine years. She gets her supplies in Benin. This is the second time Espérance is seeking a loan with ALIDÉ, with the goal of raising the level of her business and increasing her sales and income.

loans.use: To buy bags of maize.

loans.name: Vannessa

texts.es: Vannesa, tiene la edad de 26  años, está casado, vive con sus 2 hijos y su esposo que son sus mayores prioridades. Ella pretende con su crédito compra los insumos necesarios para la asistencia de su finca que está sembrada de café. Ella tiene la plantación ya establecida hace años atrás y lo que querer es mejorarla y así obtenerle mejores resultados este próximo año. Ella quiere generar ganancias para su bienestar familiar y así también generar ganancias para ir saliendo con el crédito adelante y cumplir todas sus metas propuestas.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella  no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Vannesa is 26 years old, married, and lives with her two children and husband who are her main priorities.  She plans to use her loan to buy the supplies she needs to look after her farm where she is growing coffee.  Vannesa set up her plantation years ago and what she wants is to improve it so that she can obtain better results in the upcoming year.  She would like to make profits for her family's well-being and also so that she can then take another loan and achieve all her goals. 

This is Vannesa's first loan from FUDECOSUR.  She has not received any previous loans from state banks but FUDECOSUR offered her this loan with better repayment terms and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to take care of her farm

loans.name: Ana Luisa

texts.es:
Ana Luisa tiene 50 años, es soltera vive sola no tiene hijos, vive en el Recinto El Progreso Perteneciente al Cantón Chillanes.

Los miembros de la V.R.C DIVINO NIÑO, está ubicada a 20 minutos de la oficina en Chillanes, está constituida por 10 socios es el tercer crédito que solicitan a la cooperativa, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican a la agricultura siembran cacao, maíz y plátano, además se dedican a la comercialización de granos secos.


Ana Luisa  se dedica a la agricultura siembra cacao, maíz, plátano, soya y yuca, además se dedica a la crianza de aves. Las compras las realiza en Chillanes y San Pablo y las vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.

El crédito le ayudará en la compra de insumos, fertilizantes, el crédito le apoyado de manera que han incrementado la producción de los cultivos. Ha enfrentado desafíos como enfermedades de los trabajadores y las plagas y enfermedades en los cultivos. Su sueño es llegar a tener dinero.

Le gusta ser una persona trabajadora y escuchar musica.
texts.en:
Ana Luisa is 50 years old, single, and doesn't have any children.  She lives in El Progreso, in Chillanes canton.

The 'DIVINO NIÑO' community bank is located 20 minutes from our Chillanes office.  It has ten members and this is the third loan that they have requested from our organization.  The members of this bank work in agriculture, growing cacao, corn and bananas.  They also sell dried grains.

Ana Luisa is a farmer who grows cacao, corn, bananas, soy and cassava.  She also raises birds.  She makes her purchases in Chillanes and San Pablo and makes her sales in the Sunday market in Chillanes.

This loan will help Ana Luisa to buy supplies and fertilizers.  Her loans have helped her to increase her crop production.  She has faced challenges such as illnesses amongst her workers, pest infestations and plant diseases.  Her dream is to have money.

Ana Luisa enjoys being a hard-working person and listening to music.

loans.use: to buy supplies and fertilizers

loans.name: Hermelinda

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “REYNA D. LOS ANGELES D. URQUILLOS”; el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito D. Urquillos en la Provincia D. Calca y Departamento D. Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Hermelinda; la socia tiene 58 años D. edad, la socia es casada; La socia tiene 3 hijos; la socia se dedica a la agricultura como actividad principal, la socia alterna su actividad económica con la venta D. verduras ella venD. todo tipo D. verduras tales como tomate, brócoli, coliflor, habas, arvejas, zanahoria, cebollas, lechuga; la socia venD. al por mayor también maíz, cuando está fresco venD. en calidad D. choclo, cuando está madura termina D. secar y se venD. como maíz o granos secos. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra D. semilla D. maíz para la siembra.

La socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir D. manera disciplinada con los pagos D. las cuotas.
texts.en:
Hermelinda is a member of the "Reyna D. los Ángeles D. Urquillos" community bank which is located in Urquillos district, in Calca province, in Cusco department.

Hermelinda is 58 years old, married, and has three children.  Her main business activity is farming but she also sells vegetables.  She sells all sorts of vegetables such as tomatoes, broccoli, cauliflower, beans, peas, carrots, onions and lettuce.  She sells corn wholesale.  She sells fresh corn and, when it is ripe, she also dries it and sells it as dried corn kernels.

Hermelinda is requesting this loan to invest in buying corn seed to sow.  She is grateful for the support that she is being given and pledges to make her repayments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to invest in buying corn seed to sow

loans.name: Silvia Elena

texts.es:
Silvia tiene su propio negocio en donde inicio hace seis años, con la venta de una mini pulperia, en donde se ha ayudado para pagar los gastos basicos, su esposo labora como conductor, y juntos han logrado hacer su casa de concreto, en donde ha sido posible, gracias a los prestamo que Afodenic ha dado en seis ciclos.
Sus tres hijos estan estudiando, tambien apoyan en su negocio en el servicio al cliente.
Sus proyecto con este nuevo financiamiento es pera la contruccion de paredes interna como para el repello de su casa, dando mejor refuerzo a las paredes, tambien lograra que se vea bonita para luego pintarla. Como planes es comprar mas producto de consumo para su negocio, ya que tiene poca mercaderia.
texts.en:
Silvia has her own business which she started six years ago with sales from a mini grocery store.  This has helped her to pay for basic expenses.  her husband works as a driver, and together they have managed to build their house out of concrete.  This was made possible thanks to the loans that Afodenic has given them through six lending cycles.

Silvia's three children are at school, they also support her business by providing service to the customers.

Her projects with this new funding are construction of internal walls, plastering her home, providing better reinforcement to the walls, and also managing to make it look nice and then painting it.  Her plans are to buy more consumer products for her business, which has little merchandise.

loans.use: to build internal walls and plaster her home, buying construction materials.

loans.name: María Cristina

texts.es:
La Señora Maria Cristina está casada, tiene 29 años de edad, tiene un hijo menor. Posee casa propia en la ciudad de Encarnación, donde reside con su hijo.
La clienta es comerciante, es decir, se dedica a la venta de ropas usadas, posee un local comercial al costado de la termal de ómnibus. Cuenta con 3 años de antigüedad lo que le permite contar con muy buena clientela e ingresos.
Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora y luchadora, comenta que todo su esfuerzo esta encaminada ofrecerle un futuro mejor y una educación mejor de la que tuvo ella, a su hijo.
La Sra Maria solicita el credito para la compra de ropas de invierno, con lo que podrá abastecerse para poder ofrecer mas variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Sra. Maria Cristina is 29 years old, married, and has a young child. She owns a home in the city of Encarnación where she lives with her son.

Maria Cristina is a merchant who sells used clothes. She has a shop next to the bus terminal. Maria Cristina has been in business for three years and has a good customer base and income. She is a very hardworking and determined woman. Maria Cristina says that all of her efforts are aimed toward offering her son a better future and a good education that she did not have.

She is requesting a loan to buy winter clothing so that she can stock up and offer greater variety to her customers.

loans.use: to purchase winter clothing to sell.

loans.name: Nelys

texts.es: Nelys dedicada al arte de la confección, ofrece entre sus diseños  prendas de vestir, femenina colchas, cubrelechos e individuales para la mesa,  a una  clientela compuesta por vecinos, familiares y referidos, que cada día plantean mayores exigencias de calidad, y esperan mejores precios,  lo cual la tiene muy entusiasmada y despertando aún más su creatividad a Nelys, quien tiene el  gran desafío de lograr, que su capital de trabajo,  le alcance para responder a su clientela de manera oportuna, pues vende a crédito la mayor parte de sus prendas.   Esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a al Fundación Mario Santo Domingo,  con el fin de comprar materias primas, e insumos en diversos colores y texturas, en mayor volumen, para obtener descuentos y adaptarse a los requerimientos que tiene su clientela con respecto a la moda. Desde muy niña Nelys aprendió de su tía el arte de la confección y cuando estuvo adulta eligió esta actividad como su trabajo principal, compró su primera máquina y desde entonces no ha parado. Hoy a sus 54 años se siente muy contenta por esta decisión, porque durante todo este periodo ha logrado conquistar un mercado muy rentable que hoy la refiere a otros clientes.  En la actualidad está incursionando en la línea de telas de hamacas que se encuentran muy de moda y tiene muchos encargos de nuevos clientes. Su meta más adelante es tener un local propio donde exhibir lo que confecciona y ampliar su infraestructura técnica con maquinarias que hagan cada vez mejor su producto y le permita crear nuevas fuentes de ingreso a otras personas. Mientras trabaja persistentemente, Nelys maneja una liquidez que le permite cumplir sus obligaciones, y una rentabilidad no menor al 15% que planea aumentar en la medida en que incremente su capital de trabajo.
texts.en:
Nelys is a dressmaker.  She sells women's clothes, bedspreads and table mats to a customer base which is made up of neighbors, family members and people who she has been recommended to.  They increasingly make more demands for quality products and expect better prices.  This makes Nelys very excited and awakens her creativity even more.  Her big challenge is ensuring that her working capital stretches far enough to allow her to respond to her customers in a timely fashion as she sells most of her products on credit.  For this reason, she is applying for a Kiva loan - her first loan through Fundación Mario Santo Domingo - to buy raw materials and supplies, in different colors and textures.  She will buy in larger volumes so that she can obtain discounts and adapt to her customers' needs with respect to fashion.

Nelys learned the art of dressmaking from her aunt when she was very young and, when she grew up, she chose this as her main business activity.  She bought her first machine and since then she hasn't stopped.  Now, at 54 years old, she feels very happy to have made this decision because, over the years, she has managed to capture a very profitable market and people recommend her to other customers.  She is currently starting a new line of products, making hammocks, which are currently very much in fashion.  She has lots of orders from new customers.

Nelys' goal for the future is to own her own store where she can display the goods she makes and expand her technical infrastructure with machines that help her to make better products and allow her to create new sources of income for other people.  While she continues working persistently, Nelys maintains a cash flow that allows her to meet her obligations and has a profitability of no less than 15%.  She plans to increase her profitability as she increases her working capital.

loans.use: to buy raw materials and supplies, in different colors and textures, in larger volumes

loans.name: Aida

texts.es:
Aida de profesion docente, labora desde hace treita años en la educacion, asi mismo comercializa cosmeticos, logrando mejores ingresos para el bienestar comun de la familia.
Es atraves de Afodenic que logra la comercializacion de su inversion en ventas, al aumentar en productos. Este es su septimo ciclo de prestamo en donde comprara laminas de zinc para continuar la ampliacion del techo de su vivienda, a si como levantar mas alta la pared de concreto, ya que esta insegura, por que la tiene con laminas de playcem, el cual hara la mejora.
Doña Aida, cuenta con la ayuda de sus hijos, hoy en dia casados, como madre apoya  a su hija que es madre soltera. Y que espera que mejore su vida en lo personal de su hija. Ambas se apoyan para lograr cubrir los gastos basicos, gastos alimenticios, educacion, entre otros gastos personales.
texts.en:
Aida is a teacher by profession.  She has been working in the field of education for thirty years.  She also sells cosmetics in order to make better income for the general well-being of her family.  Through Afodenic, she has managed to invest in her sales business and increase the products that she sells.

This is Aida's seventh loan cycle.  She will buy sheets of corrugated metal to continue extending the roof of her home and also build an existing wall a bit higher.  The wall is not currently safe as it has Plycem (fiber cement) panels.  She will use the new supplies to make the improvement.

Aida has the help of her sons who are married.  She supports her daughter who is a single mother.  She hopes to improve her daughter's life.  Both women support each other in order to cover their basic expenses, food expenses, education expenses and other personal expenses.

loans.use: to buy sheets of corrugated metal, blocks, cement and iron so that she can build a wall a bit higher and continue extending her roof

loans.name: San Juan Group

texts.es:
El Comité de Mujeres San Juan se encuentran en el tercer ciclo, son muy conocidas en el barrio por su cooperación, coordinación y solidaridad las unas con las otras.
Se definen como mujeres trabajadoras, jefas de familia que luchan día a día por el pan de sus hijos. Se unieron con un fin en común que es la obtención de mayores ingresos para paliar los gastos del hogar.
La Sra Fidelina es peluquera, es muy conocida en el barrio por su excelente forma de tratar a los clientes, es muy trabajadora y luchadora. Comenta que todo el esfuerzo que hace es por el bien de su familia. Le encantaría algún día poder ampliar su negocio.
Solicita el credito para la compra de gel, tintes, y demás instrumentos para el ejercicio de su profesión. Ella sabe que el credito le sera de mucha ayuda, desde ya agradece a la Fundación por la oportunidad.
texts.en:
The San Juan Committee of Women is participating in its third loan cycle. They are well-known in the neighborhood for working together with cooperation, coordination, and solidarity. The members define themselves as working women and heads of households who strive each day to provide for their children. They have joined together for the common purpose of obtaining more income to offset their household expenses.

Sra. Fidelina is a beautician who is well-known in her neighborhood for the excellent way she treats her customers. She is a hard worker and a fighter. Fidelina says that all of her efforts are aimed toward providing for the welfare of her family. Someday she would like to expand her business.

The loan she is requesting will be used to buy gel, dyes, and other supplies needed to perform her job. Fidelina knows that the loan will be a great help and expresses her appreciation to Fundación Paraguaya for this opportunity.

loans.use: to purchase gel, dyes, and other supplies.

loans.name: Luz Marina

texts.es: Luz Marina es una mujer de 46 años que vive en Soledad, municipio a 10 minutos de la ciudad de Barranquilla, con sus 4 hijos en las edades de 10 a 25 años.  Ella está dedicada a la confección de ropa como suéteres, jeans,  blusas y en general ropa informal, en un negocio que inició hace un año, cuando dejó de trabajar en una empresa como empleada y se dedicó a cumplir su sueño emprendedor, para  lograr un tiempo de calidad al lado de sus hijos. Luz Marina cuando trabajaba en una empresa también aprovechaba el gran número de trabajadores de esta, para venderles mercancías a crédito, con las que logró iniciar la clientela principal que en la actualidad le compra  hermosos vestidos confeccionados por Luz Marina.  Su credikiva es el primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el comprará una maquina industrial de confecciones y telas para la producción de ropa en tejido de punto. Su gran sueño y desafío es fortalecer su negocio y generar cada vez más ingresos. Luz Marina trabaja especialmente en la línea   de suéteres,  blusas de franela, lo cual en su mayoría funciona tipo maquila. En tiempos libres elabora productos propios que vende en sectores aledaños; además de comerciar con productos por catálogo y mercancías en general por encargo. Su mayor desafío es lograr capitalizar su negocio de confecciones, pues sus estados financieros muestran un negocio incipiente con ventas bajas,  pero se compensa por los ingresos adicionales de maquila y las mercancías por encargo. Los indicadores financieros, muestran una estabilidad en el negocio, y condiciones favorables para la inversión de su credikiva.
texts.en:
Luz Marina is a 46 year-old woman who lives in Soledad, a town which is located 10 minutes from the city of Barranquilla.  She lives with her four children who are aged between 10 and 25.  Luz Marina makes clothes such as sweaters, jeans, blouses and casual clothes in general.  She started her business one year ago when she stopped working as a company employee and started fulfilling her entrepreneurial dream, so that she could spend more quality time with her children. 

When she used to work for a company, Luz Marina would make the most of the fact that there were a lot of workers and would sell them merchandise on credit.  She managed to build up a customer base and these customers currently buy the beautiful clothes that she makes.  This Kiva loan is Luz Marina's first loan from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo and she will use it to buy an industrial sewing machine and materials for making knitted clothes.  Her big dream and challenge is to strengthen her business and make more income.

Luz Marina mainly assembles sweaters and t-shirts.  In her spare time, she makes her own products which she sells in neighboring areas.  She also sells catalog products and general merchandise to order.  Her biggest challenge is managing to capitalize her dressmaking business as her financial statements show a fledgling business with low sales but which is supplemented with additional income from the clothes assembly work and the merchandise she sells to order.  Luz Marina's financial indicators show a stability in her business and favorable conditions for the investment of her Kiva loan.

loans.use: to buy an industrial sewing machine and materials for making knitted clothes

loans.name: Raquel

texts.es:
Raquel se dedica  a la carpintería, ella  empezó  desde  muy chica, su papá también es carpintero y su carpintería se llama "Antonio", que es el nombre de su hijo el mas chico de tres años de edad.
Ella pidió el préstamo  para comprar más material  para no atrasarse en sus pedidos por falta de materiales.
Raquel  va todos los sábados y domingos  donde vive su hermana para que le cuide a su hijo, ya que, esos días los necesita para sacar los pedidos que  tiene para no perder a sus clientes ya que a ellos les gusta su trabajo.
Además de la carpintería Raquel siembra maíz en su terreno alrededor de la casas de sus papás.
Recibió préstamo de otro  banco  para  invertirlo en su milpa  y vender en las localidades  vecinas.
Raquel es madre  soltera  de treinta cuatro años de edad .  Ella solamente  estudio  segundo año de secundaria. Quiere  que su hijo tenga mas oportunidades cuando este mas grande  para   cumplir sus sueños.
Su sueño más  grande es  incrementar más su negocio  para  tener una mejor calidad de vida.
Le da las gracias a fundación realidad por apoyo que les ha dado para realizar  sus sueños.
texts.en:
Raquel is a dedicated carpenter. She began when she was very young – her father was also a carpenter -- and her carpentry shop is called “Antonio,” the name of her young son, who is 3 years old. Raquel is requesting a loan to buy more materials to avoid falling behind in fulfilling customer orders for lack of materials.

Raquel goes every Saturday and Sunday to her sister's house so she can care for her son, since these days, Raquel needs to work every day to fulfill the customer orders she has, and avoid losing clients who like her work.

In addition to carpentry, Raquel sows corn on the land surrounding her parents' houses. She received a loan from another bank to invest in her corn field and she sells the harvest in neighborhood localities. 

Raquel is a 34-year-old single mother. She only studied to the 2nd year of secondary school. Raquel wants her son to have more opportunities to fulfill his dreams when he grows up.

Raquel's biggest dream is to increase her business in order to have a better quality of life. She thanks Fundacion Realidad for its help in realizing her dreams.

loans.use: to buy material to fulfill orders at her carpentry shop.

loans.name: Dionicio Francisco

texts.es:
Dionicio tiene una tienda de abarrotes donde también vende frutas y verduras, además de la tienda de abarrotes, Dionicio trabaja la carpintería desde hace 5 años. El esta pidiendo el préstamo para hacer mas grande  su carpintería.
Cuenta con un local grande pero lo que  mas necesita es material ya que  su inventario esta escaso .
El señor Dionicio siempre le a gustado  tener una carpintería  mas  grande para que sus hijos  le puedan ayudar y aprendan ya que les gusta un poco.
Además de la carpintería le gusta mucho atender su tienda de abarrotes ya que su esposa Luisa la ayuda en su carpintería .
Todos los fines de semana van a los pueblos vecinos  a vender sus mesas cosas necesarias para obtener mas ganancias  y comprar  mas material.
Esta muy contento por el apoyo que les  ha  dado su esposa en esto de pedir el préstamo para comprar mas material para hacer trabajos mas  grandes y a domicilio, ya que ella lo acompaña para que el trabajo sea mas rápido.
Le da las gracias a Fundación Realidad por el apoyo que les ha dado para salir adelante en su carpintería ya  que uno de sus mejores sueños es hacer  su carpintería  grande y con mas material para que sus clientes se sientan muy contentos y vuelva a su carpintería Luisa.
texts.en:
Dionicio has a grocery store which also sells fruits and vegetables.  In addition to the grocery store, Dionicio has been doing carpentry work for the last 5 years. He is asking for the loan to grow his carpentry shop.

He has a large space, but what he needs is more lumber as his inventory is low.  Señor Dionicio would always have liked a larger carpentry shop so his children are able to help him and learn and that they will enjoy it a bit.

In addition to carpentry he really likes to keep his grocery store stocked and his wife Luisa helps him with the carpentry.  Every weekend they go to neighboring towns to sell their tables and necessary items to get more profits and to buy more lumber.

He is very pleased by the support that his wife has given him, and is asking for this loan to buy more lumber to do larger jobs, and at home, as she accompanies him so that his work goes faster.

He thanks Fundación Realidad for the support given to him so that he can move ahead with his carpentry shop. as one of his biggest dreams is to to make his carpentry shop bigger and have more lumber so that his clients will be very happy and will return to his carpentry shop.

loans.use: to buy lumber for carpentry

loans.name: Santiago Alvaro

texts.es:
Santiago Álvaro  tiene una tienda de verduras y también se dedica es a la  carpintería.
 
El pidió el préstamo para comprar mas material para no atrasarse  en sus pedidos pero lo que mas le urge es hacer mas grande su local. Ha  tenido su carpintería desde hace  ocho meses  y dice  que el préstamo  le ayuda mucho en este caso por que su inventario es escaso. Ahora sus ventas  han estado  muy bien, y por eso quiere comprar mas material.

Además de la carpintería sale todos los fines de semana, va comprar frutas y verdura, hace un mes que también empezo a vender abarrotes como son: jabón, aceite y refrescos.

Santiago Álvaro tiene  veinte años, él solamente estudio el bachillerato  y quiere seguir estudiando los fines de semana, Sueña con terminar una licenciatura para  que sus padres estén orgullosos de él, otro de sus sueños es hacer de su carpinteria un lugar  mas grande y  mas lindo para que sus clientes  lo visiten y se sientan como el casa.

Le da las gracias a fundación realidad por el apoyo que le ha  brindado para salir adelante.
texts.en:
Santiago Álvaro has a greengrocer's shop, but also works doing carpentry.

He has asked for the loan to buy more lumber so as not to fall behind on his orders, but what he needs most urgently is to make his space bigger.
He has had his carpentry shop for eight months and says that the loan will help a lot in this case since his inventory is low.  Now his sales have been going well, so wants to buy more lumber.

In addition to his carpentry, he goes every weekend to buy fruits and vegetables.  A month ago, he also began selling groceries such as soap, oil and soft drinks.

Santiago Álvaro is twenty years old, he is only studying for his high school qualification and wants to continue studying on weekends. He dreams of completing a college degree so that his parents will be proud of him.  Another of his dreams is to make his carpentry shop larger and nicer for his customers to visit and feel like they're at home.

He thanks Fundación Realidad for the support that they have provided for him to get ahead in life.

loans.use: to buy carpentry materials.

loans.name: Elias

texts.es:
Elías se dedica a la carpintería , el pidió el préstamo para   comprar mas material ,  ya que  casi no hace trabajos grandes solamente pequeños por falta de material.
Cuenta  con un local grande  pero lo que no tiene es suficiente material y cuando tiene trabajos grandes le pide a su hermano Ulises , también es carpintero y le presta material , pero a  Elías para  comprar material para poder ser mas independiente.
Sus clientes le dicen que les gustaría que compre mas material ya que ellos quisieren  trabajos pero como no tiene material no le encargan nada  de los que ellos les gustaría.
Elías tiene    treinta años de edad, estudio la secundaria  la termino es una buen carpintero  es casado con la señora Lucero y vive  con sus papás, le gustaría  comparar mas material, para hacer mas trabajos  y a si comprar una casa.
Tiene dos hijos  Adriana de  diez años edad y Luis de  2 años  de edad , por ellos quiere  mejorar su carpintería , para  que tengan una casa propia.
Le da las gracias a fundación realidad por el préstamo que le han dado ya que  va comprar mas material para hacer mas  grande su inventario ya que estaba escaso.
texts.en:
Elías is a carpenter.  He requested a loan to buy more materials.  He hardly does any big jobs now; he only does small jobs because he needs materials.

He has a large place, but he does not have enough material.  When he has big jobs he asks his brother, Ulises, who is also a carpenter, to lend him material.  However, Elías wants to buy material so that he is able to be more independent.

His customers tell him that they would like for him to buy more material because they would like to have what he makes.  As he does not have material, they do not order the things they would like to.

Elías is 30 years old, and he finished high school.  He is a good carpenter.  He is married to Lucero, and they live with her parents.  He would like to buy more material to complete more jobs.  That way he will buy a house.

He has two children.  Adriana is 10 years old, and Luis is 2 years old.  He wants to improve his carpenter’s shop for them so that they can have their own house.

He is grateful to the Fundación Realidad for the loan they have given him.  He will buy more material in order to increase his inventory because is it sparse.

loans.use: to buy carpentry material.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy more ingredients to make food.

loans.name: Carla Jannina

texts.es:
Carla Jannina tiene 23 años, es soltera vive con los padres, vive en el Recinto El Progreso Perteneciente al Cantón Chillanes.

Los miembros de la V.R.C DIVINO NIÑO, está ubicada a 20 minutos de la oficina en Chillanes, está constituida por 10 socios es el tercer crédito que solicitan a la cooperativa, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican a la agricultura siembran cacao, maíz y plátano, además se dedican a la comercialización de granos secos.


Carla se dedica a la agricultura siembra cacao, maíz, plátano, soya y yuca, además se dedica a la crianza de aves. Las compras las realiza en Chillanes y San Pablo y las vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.

El crédito le ayudará en la compra de insumos, fertilizantes, el crédito le apoyado de manera que han incrementado la producción de los cultivos. Ha enfrentado desafíos como enfermedades de los trabajadores y las plagas y enfermedades en los cultivos. Su sueño es culminar los estidios.

Le gusta ser alegre y disfrutar las fiestas de la comunidad.
texts.en:
Carla Jannina is 23 years old, single, and lives with her parents.  She lives in the Recinto El Progreso, which belongs to the canton of Chillanes.

The members of the rural communal bank "Divino Nino" are located 20 minutes from the Chillanes office.  The group has 10 members and this is the third loan that they have requested.  The members of this communal bank work in agriculture cultivating cocoa, corn and bananas.  In addition, they also sell dried grains.

Carla works in agriculture farming cocoa, corn, bananas, soybeans and cassava.  In addition, she raises poultry.  She makes her purchases in Chillanes and San Pablo, and she sells her products in the Sunday market in Chillanes.

This loan will help her to buy supplies such as fertilizers.  The loans have helped her to increase the productivity of her croplands.  She has confronted challenges such as pests and diseases that affect her crops and illnesses that have affected her workers.  Her dream is to complete her education.

She likes to be happy and enjoy the festivities in the community.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and fertilizer

loans.name: Eralda Amariles

texts.es:
Eralda Amariles tiene 53 años, es casada vive con el esposo y con los hijos, vive en el Recinto El Progreso Perteneciente al Cantón Chillanes.

Los miembros de la V.R.C DIVINO NIÑO, está ubicada a 20 minutos de la oficina en Chillanes, está constituida por 10 socios es el tercer crédito que solicitan a la cooperativa, los miembros de esta ventanilla se dedican a la agricultura siembran cacao, maíz y plátano, además se dedican a la comercialización de granos secos.


eralda Amariles se dedica a la agricultura siembra cacao, maíz, plátano, soya y yuca, además se dedica a la crianza de aves. Las compras las realiza en Chillanes y San Pablo y las vende en la feria de los domingos en Chillanes.

El crédito le ayudará en la compra de insumos, fertilizantes, el crédito le apoyado de manera que han incrementado la producción de los cultivos. Ha enfrentado desafíos como enfermedades de los trabajadores y las plagas y enfermedades en los cultivos. Su sueño es comprar un aumentar las ventas.

Le gusta ser una persona alegre, le gusta decansar y festejar las fiestas de carnaval.
texts.en:
Eralda Amariles, 53, is married and lives with her husband and children.  She lives in the Recinto El Progreso, which belongs to the canton of Chillanes.

The members of the rural communal bank "Divino Nino" live 20 minutes from the Chillanes office.  The group has 10 members, and this is the third loan that they have requested.  The members of this communal bank are farmers who cultivate cocoa, corn and bananas, and they also sell dried grains.

Eralda Amariles works in agriculture farming cocoa, corn, bananas, soybeans and cassava.  She also raises poultry.  She makes her purchases in Chillanes and San Pablo and she sells her products in the Sunday market in Chillanes.

This loan will help her to buy supplies such as fertilizer.  The loans have helped her to increase the production on her fields.  She has confronted challenges such as illnesses that have affected her workers, and diseases and pests that have affected her crops.  Her dream is to increase her sales. 

She likes to be a happy person; she enjoys the holidays when she can rest and join in the festivities.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies and fertilizer

loans.name: Luz De Bendicion 1 & 2 Group

texts.en:
Marie is one of the members of the “Luz de Bendicion 1 & 2” (Light of blessing) group which is comprised of 10 micro-businesswomen. They are involved in clothing sales, natural products sales, shoe sales, food sales, etc. Marie lives in the city of La Romana. Its economy depends on tourism and the sugarcane industry. 

Marie is very excited to receive her second loan from Esperanza Internacional, having satisfactorily repaid her previous loan and taken an important step in her business growth. She has had her business for about eight years; she started it with her saving. She is running a cosmetics and shoes sales, and she is planning on investing the new loan to have capital and be able to buy what her clients order. She does her sales by walking around with products and with a catalog. When her clients order an item, she buys it and most of them pay on credit. 

Marie’s family is made up of herself, her long-term partner and their three children, of whom two live in her house. She tells us that her greatest challenge is to build her house into a better structure. She will use her profits to save and start making change to her house by building little by little. She thanks you all for your support!!

loans.use: to buy cosmetics and shoes.

loans.name: Kerly Maria

texts.es:
Kerly Maria tiene 20 años, Es soltera vive los padres no tiene hijos, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. NUEVO AMANCER, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto San Luis de Zapotal, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, son 12 miembros que en su mayoria  se dedica a labores como siembre de maíz y arroz.

Kerly Maria se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz  . Compra sus productos en Comercial Procan y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de insumos y fertilizantes.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafios como la falta de dinero para invertir, enfermedades de los trabajadores y plagas en los cultivos. Su sueño es comprar un carro y teminar los estudios.

Le gusta escuchar musica, y festejar las fiestas.
texts.en:
Kerly Maria is 20. She is single, has no children, and lives with her parents in the Ventanas Canton of the Los Rios province.

The members of the Nuevo Amancer communal bank are located in the San Luis de Zapotal district, belonging to the Ventanas Canton. There are 12 members, the majority of whom are labourers, sowing for example corn and rice.

Kerly Maria works in agriculture sowing corn and rice. She purchases her products in the Procan Market and sells them in the wholesale market in Ventanas.

She is requesting this loan for sowing corn and rice, and purchasing tools and fertilizers. With the support of this loan, you will support her economically to supply her needs. She confronts challenges such as a lack of money to invest, the illnesses of her workers, and plagues on her crops. Her dream is to purchase a car and finish her studies.

She enjoys listening to music and celebrating the festivals.

loans.use: to purchase tools and fertilizers.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase one cow and 6 sheep

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase one milk cow and two calves.

loans.name: Elchin

texts.en: Elchin has been in the business of cattle ranching for the last eight years. He is only 29 but already a very experienced and successful entrepreneur. He has a good client history with AqroInvest. With his previous two loans, he was able to expand his business and purchase more sheep for his herd. The breeding business requires a lot of dedication and effort, since it requires the strict control of each animal, including feed and care for those that are older. Through this business, Elchin is able to support his family. He applied for a 1500 AZN loan to purchase more sheep and to expand his farm.

loans.use: to purchase twenty sheep.

loans.name: Vilma Esther

texts.es: Doña Vilma de 36 años de edad, es casada, tiene una hija; trabaja como fisioterapeuta del hospital Jacinto Hernandez desde hace 13 años, cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo quien asume los gastos del hogar. Vilma solicita su 9no crèdito para terminar  de construir una habitaciòn y de esta manera tener mejores condiciones en su hogar para su familia y ademas darle mas valor a su propiedad, ademas tiene la ventaja que su esposo trabaja como albañil y se ahorra el pago de la mano de obra que es bien cara. Su sueño en la vida es seguir estudiando y que a su unica hija goze de salud y  que no le falte lo basico en el hogar.
texts.en: Mrs Vilma, age 36, is married and has one daughter. She has worked as a physiotherapist in the Jacinto Hernandez hospital for 13 years. Her husband, who covers the household costs, supports her. Vilma is requesting her ninth loan to finish building a room and thus have better conditions in her home for her family. This will also increase her property value. They also have the advantage of her husband doing the brickwork, which saves them the cost of labour, which is expensive. Her dream in life is to continue studying, and for her only daughter to have good health, and to never lack the basic necessities.

loans.use: to finish a room.

loans.name: Yovana

texts.es:
Yovana es socia del  Banco Comunal “Virgen de la Asunción”, ubicado en el distrito y provincia de Yunguyo, departamento de Puno, tiene 30 años de edad, está casada y tiene 3 hijos.  Estudió hasta 3ro de secundaria.
Ella se dedica a la confección de casacas, nos cuenta que sus productos los vende en la ciudad de Lima, Cusco y a veces en la localidad de Yunguyo.  Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace treinta ciclos, la primera vez que solicito su préstamo fue de S/ 500.00 nuevo soles, este dinero lo invirtió en su negocio.
Con éste nuevo préstamo de S/  1500.00 nuevo soles, comprará cien metros de telas de polar para la confección de casacas para ponerlas a la venta.
Su sueño es seguir trabajando con el negocio y tener un carro para realizar servicios.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la reunión, el préstamo de los ahorros (cuenta interna) y el préstamo complementario.
texts.en:
Yovana is a member of the Virgen de la Asuncion Communal Bank, located in the district and province of Yunguyo, in the Puno department. She is 30, married, and has 3 children. She studied up to the third grade of secondary school.
She makes jackets, and tells us that she sells her products in the city of Lima, Cusco, and sometimes in Yunguyo. She has worked with the Movimiento Manuel Ramos for three cycles. The first loan that she requested was for 500 soles. She will invest this loan in her business.
With this new loan of 1500 soles, she will purchase 100 meters of fleece fabric for making jackets for sale.
Her dream is to continue working in her business and have a car for services. 
What she likes about her Communal Bank are the meetings, the loans issued against the internal savings account, and the regular Communal Bank loans.

loans.use: to purchase 100 meters of fleece fabric

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more household and food products.

loans.name: Aura Lilliam

texts.es: Aura Lilliam de 32 años, es casada, tiene 2 hijos estudiando la primaria,  trabaja desde hace 11 años como docente de primaria. Esta solicitando su 2do credito para mejorar la infraestructura de su humilde vivienda pues con el paso del tiempo se ha ido deteriorando, cuenta con el apoyo de su marido que esta trabajando en Costa Rica y mensualmente le envia dinero para los gastos del hogar y para sus hijos, su mayor sueño en la vida es mejorar la infraestructura de su vivienda y que  a sus hijos no le falte nada.
texts.en: Aura Lilliam, who is 32 years old, is married and has 2 children who go to elementary school.  She has been working for 11 years as an elementary school teacher.  She is requesting her 2nd loan to improve the infrastructure of her humble housing, which has been deteriorating over time.  Aura Lilliam has the help of her husband, who is working in Costa Rica and sends her money on a monthly basis to help with the household expenses and for their children.  Aura Lilliam's greatest dream is to improve the infrastructure of her house and for her children to not want for anything.

loans.use: with home improvements.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase two cattle and 6 sheep.

loans.name: Fazil

texts.en:
Fazil is 51, married and has one child. He is a livestock breeder with 3 years of experience. 

Very dynamic, serious, and entrepreneurial, Fazil is proposing to expand his flock and to repair his animal enclosure. This will meet the needs of a rather large clientele from his village and from neighboring villages. Some of his clientele come to buy animals from far away villages. With his goal in mind, Fazil is requesting a loan of 1000 ANZ to serve him as business capital. The profit he will make from this business will allow him to improve his living conditions and he will also make some investments to his business.

loans.use: to purchase 12 sheep to invest in his business.

loans.name: Ynes

texts.es:
Ynes es socia del  Banco Comunal “Virgen de la Asunción”, ubicado en el distrito y provincia de Yunguyo, departamento de Puno, tiene 64 años de edad, está separada y tiene 8 hijos, todos independientes.  Estudió hasta 1ro de educación primaria.
Se dedica a la venta de sacos y bolsas.  Trabaja con el Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace dos años, su primer préstamo  fue por la suma  de S/ 500.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio.
Con éste nuevo préstamo de S/ 1,000.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invertirá en la compra de quinientos unidades de sacos y bolsas.  En el negocio trabaja sola, a veces sus hijos le ayudan.
Su sueño es seguir con el negocio para solventar sus gastos.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la facilidad del préstamo y la reunión con las demás socias
texts.en:
Ynes is a member of the Community Bank "Virgen de la Asunción", which is located in the district and province of Yunguyo in the Department of Puno.  She is 64 years old and separated from her husband, and she has eight children, all of whom are independent. She studied up to the first level of primary education.

Ynes sells sacks and bags.  She has been working with the Manuela Ramos Movement for two years ago; her first loan was for the sum of 500 New Soles, the money from which she invested in her business.

With this new loan of 1,000 New Soles, the money will be invested in the purchase of five hundred units of sacks and bags.   She works on her own in the business, sometimes helped by her children.

Her dream is to continue with the business to cover her expenses.

What she likes about the Community Bank is the convenience of the loans and meeting with the other members.

loans.use: to buy 500 units of sacks and bags.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase two cattle and fodder.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase three cattle.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase seeds and fertilizer and one calf.

loans.name: Jose Alexander

texts.es:
Jose Alexander tiene 20 años, Es soltero vive con los padres no tiene hijos, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. NUEVO AMANECER, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Luis de Zapotal, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla son 12 miembros se en su mayoria dedica a labores como siembre de maíz y arroz, actividad mas antigua.

Jose Alexander se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz. Compra sus productos en Comercial Procan y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de insumos y fertilizantes para los cultivos.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrentan desafios como enfermedades de los trabajadores y falta de dinero para seguir invirtiendo. Su sueño es terminar sus estudios e incrementar la produccion para ayudar a los padres.

Le gusta ser una persona emprendedora y ser un hombre trabajador.
texts.en:
Jose Alexander, 20. is single, without children, and he lives with his parents in the Ventanas canton, Los Rios province.  
The members of his communal bank V.R.C. Nuevo Amancer meet in the building of San Luis de Zapotal in Ventanas canton.  This chapter of 12 members is dedicated to growing corn and rice, an older business.

Jose Alexander works as a farmer and grows rice and corn.  He buys his supplies in Comercial Procan and sells them in the wholesale market in Ventanas.

He is requesting a loan to buy supplies and fertilizers for the corn and rice.  The support of the financing will help him buy what he needs.  His dream is to finish school and increase production to help his parents.  He confronts problems such as the illness in the workers and lack of money to continue investing.

He wants to be an entrepreneur and a hard-working man.

loans.use: To buy supplies and fertilizer

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es:
Victoria es socia del  Banco Comunal “Virgen de la Asunción”, ubicado en el distrito y provincia de Yunguyo, departamento de Puno, tiene 52 años de edad, está casada y tiene 4 hijos en edad escolar.  Estudió hasta la primaria.
Victoria se dedica a la venta de animales caseros como ovinos y chanchos, trabaja con Movimiento Manuela Ramos desde hace ocho años, su préstamo anterior fue de S/ 300.00 nuevo soles, dinero que invirtió en su negocio venta de animales.
Con éste nuevo préstamo de S/ 2000.00 nuevo soles, comprará cinco animales.  Nos cuenta que  los compra y lo vende en la plaza de ganados, a veces los engorda por cuatro meses.
En el negocio la ayuda sus hijos y su esposo, quien trabaja en el municipio.
Su sueño es ver a sus hijos todos profesionales.
Lo que le gusta del Banco Comunal es la puntualidad y la responsabilidad.
texts.en:
Victoria is a member of the communal bank “Virgen de la Asunción,” which is located in the district and province of Yunguyo in the department of Puno.  She is 52 years old, married, and has 4 school-aged children.  She has an elementary school education.

Victoria has a business selling animals such as sheep and pigs.  She has been working with the Movimiento Manuela Ramos organization for 8 years.  Her previous loan was for 300 Peruvian soles, and she used the money to invest in her business selling animals.

With this new loan of 2,000 Peruvian soles, she will buy 5 animals.  She tells us that she buys and sells her animals in the livestock market in Puno, and she fattens her animals for about 4 months.

She is assisted in her business by her children and her husband, who works for the municipality.

Her dream is to see her children become professionals.

What she likes about her communal bank is that the members are punctual and responsible.

loans.use: to buy 5 animals

loans.name: Elsa

texts.es: Doña Elsa de 41 años de edad se desempeña como auxiliar de Enfermeria en el centro de salud del Coral desde hace 17 años, se caracteriza por ser una mujer servicial, responsable y muy trabajadora en su comunidad, su esposo trabaja para Meco Santa Fe  ambos son bien honestos y  bien queridos en su comunidad.  Esta solicitando su 4to credito con el objetivo de comprar materiales para poco a poco ir haciendo de concreto su vivienda; su mayor sueño en la vida es que su linda familia goze de  salud y mejorar su vivienda poco a poco para gozar de mejores condiciones  y seguir siendo beneficiada con este fondo.
texts.en:
Doña Elsa is 41 years old and has worked as a nursing assistant in the health center in Coral for 17 years.  She is characterized by being a helpful, responsible and hard working woman in her community.  Her husband works for Meco Santa Fe.  Both are honest and well loved in their community.

Elsa is applying for her fourth loan in order to buy materials to make her home from concrete, one step at a time.  Her biggest dream in life is that her beautiful family enjoys good health, and to improve her home one step at a time so as to enjoy better conditions, and to continue benefiting from this fund.

loans.use: to buy construction materials.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase three calves and one pregnant cow.

loans.name: Venicia Azucena

texts.es:
Venicia Azucena tiene 45 años, Es casada vive con la esposa y con los 4 hijos, de 22, 18, 16 y 9 años en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.
