loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more coffee for resale.

loans.name: Caro

texts.en:
Caro is a married woman who lives in a rental house that has electricity but not piped water. Her greatest monthly expenses are food and rent.

For the past three years, Caro has operated a clothing sales business, selling at wholesale and at the market to her neighbours and passersby. She also operates a retail shop which provides her with another source of income. Caro faces a major challenge of high transportation costs in her business. She dreams of expanding and becoming a wholesale supplier in the future.

Caro plans to use this KES 20,000 loan to purchase bundles of clothes, wheat flour and maize flour. She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of clothes, wheat flour and maize flour

loans.name: Andre Bernard

texts.fr:
Client de 48 ans, marie et pere de 3 enfants dont l'age varie entre 7 et 22 ans. N'ayany pas d'appui necessaire pour la poursuite de ses etudes , il se lance dans la coiffure homme.
Vu la frequence elevee des  clients, l'octroi du pret permettra de renforcer le materiel ou les outils de travail comme les chaises confortables, les tondeuses, le generateur electric, le ventilateur et un poste televiseur.

Il envisage de beaucoup epargner a partir de ses benefices afin de construire un salon de coiffure mixte et ainsi generer de l'emploi pour un jeune desoeuvre.
Soucieux et responsable de l'avenir de ses enfants, ul fait face a leurs droits.
texts.en:
This customer is 48 years old, married and father to three children, whose ages range from seven to 22 years old. Since he lacked the necessary support for his studies, he began a hairdressing activity for men. Given the high frequency of customers, the granting of this loan will allow him to boost his materials or work tools, by getting comfortable chairs, for instance, as well as hair clippers, an electric generator, a fan and a television. 

He is planning to save a large part of his profits so that he can build a hairdressing salon for men and women, and, as such, generate employment for an unemployed youth. Caring and responsible for his children's future, he is fighting for their rights.

loans.use: Acheter deux tondeuses, lames, de gilettes , douzaine de razoirs, ventilateur, generateur, chaises to buy two hair clippers, gillette blades, a dozen razors, a fan, a generator and chairs

loans.name: Yeremia

texts.en:
Yeremia is a 35-year-old married man with four children. He lives in his own house in Fort Portal, Uganda. His dream is to work hard and be able to pay school fees for his children.

Yeremia has been in the transportation business for seven years, specifically riding a motorcycle. His major challenge is the rainy season. Yeremia's dream is to own at least five motorcycles. Yeremia needs this loan to buy a motorcycle for transportation purposes.

loans.use: To buy a motorcycle

loans.name: Gocha

texts.en:
Gocha comes from the village of Speti, Imereti Region, West Georgia. He is 56 years old and married. His family consists of four persons: Gocha, his wife Deniza, 25-year-old daughter and 22-year-old son. Gocha works as a joiner. He produces different wooden products (furniture, household goods) in his workshop and sells them locally. Deniza works as teacher in a local school. 

Along with his main job, Gocha also finds time for the family's farming business. They have three milk cows and two pigs. Deniza produces cheese and sells it at the local market. The piglets are also sold locally. 

The total average monthly income of the family is 600 Laris. 

Gocha requests a loan to purchase a new, modern joiner's bench for wood processing. The new plan will allow him to diversify his production and offer new products to the customers. At the same time, the quality of his work will increase and he’ll be able to sell more products, as well as slightly raise the prices. The income of the family will increase and they’ll be able to improve their living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase a joiner's bench for his workshop

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase bundles of window curtains for sale.

loans.name: Gladis Helena

texts.es:
Gladis tiene un negocio de confección de correas con su hermano, ella con su taller de confección le brinda a su hijo una buena calidad de vida, además le puede brindar la posibilidad de estudiar y salir adelante.

Ella se siente muy feliz ya que puede generar algunos empleos puesto que su negocio cada vez está mejor. Gladis se sueña con una taller mas grande y así poder tener una producción mucho mejor y generar de esta forma mas empleo. Para esto necesita iniciar con la compra de una máquina dobladora que le permitirá mejora los tiempos de producción y así incrementar sus ventas y  mejorar la calidad de vida de ella y sus empleados.
texts.en:
Gladis has a manufacturing business where she makes belts with her brother. She has a manufacturing workshop that allows her to provide her son a good quality of life, the chance to study, and the ability to get ahead.

Gladis is very happy to be able to generate a few jobs since her business is getting better. She dreams of having a larger workshop so that she can have much better production and generate more jobs. For this reason, she needs to start out by purchasing a folding machine that will improve production times and increase sales. As a result, Gladis will be able to improve her quality of life and that of her employees.

loans.use: to purchase a folding machine for manufacturing belts.

loans.name: Magdalena Del Carmen

texts.es:
Magdalena del Carmen tiene 61 años, Es viuda vive con  una hija y un nieto, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. TIERRA NUESTRA, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto San Luis de Zapotal, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto como siembre de maíz y arroz.

Magdalena se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz. Compra sus productos en Comercial AGRIPAC y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de semillas y abonos de maiz y arroz.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafíos como plagas en los cultivos y la falta de dinero para pagar a mas trabajadores. Su sueño es incrementar las ventas para tener mas dienro para ayudar a la hija a educar al nieto.

Le gusta le gusta ver el futbool.
texts.en:
Magdalena del Carmen is 61 years old, widowed, and lives with a daughter and grandson in the canton of Ventanas in Los Ríos Province.

The members of the Communal Bank “Tierra Nuestra” (Our Land) meet in the neighborhood of San Luis de Zapotal, which is part of the canton of Ventanas. This Communal Bank consists of short-cycle farmers who grow corn and rice.

Magdalena is a farmer who grows corn and rice. She buys her products at the AGRIPAC commercial center and sells at the wholesale market in Ventanas.

The loan she is requesting will be used for planting corn and rice. She plans to buy seeds and compost for her corn and rice crops. With the financial assistance provided through this loan, she will be able to acquire needed supplies. The challenges she faces include diseases that could impact her crops and the lack of money to pay for more workers. Her dream is to increase sales so that she can have more money to help her daughter provide for her grandson’s education.

Magdalena enjoys watching soccer.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and compost for planting corn and rice.

loans.name: Immaculate

texts.en:
Immaculate is a 41-year-old married woman with three children living in her own house in Fort Portal, Uganda. Her family dream is to build a permanent house away from the town centre for their residence.

She has been operating a boutique for a year now and she likes her business, as she has been able to realize substantial profits. She has the challenge of limited funds to meet her increasing customer base and her desire is to own two outlets in town .Immaculate needs the loan to buy clothes to sell.

loans.use: To buy clothes to sell

loans.name: Phyllis

texts.en:
Phyllis is 41 years old and single. She runs a restaurant so as to earn a living for her family. She has been in the business for four years and has employed one person. She joined Faulu Kenya so that she would save her money and access business loans easily.

Phyllis hopes to move to a bigger business premise in the future. She has requested 30,000 Kenyan shillings to buy crates of soda.

loans.use: to buy crates of soda.

loans.name: Florence

texts.en:
Florence is a married woman with one child who attends school. She lives at a rental house that has electricity and piped water. Her greatest monthly expense is rent bills.

For the past four years, she has operated a pharmacy business, selling wholesale and retail to her neighbors and passersby. She faces a major challenge of seasonality in her business. Her dream is to establish another pharmacy shop in the future.

With the 100,000 Kenyan shillings she wants to purchase a float for mobile money transfer services (ZAP). She decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost her business.

loans.use: To purchase a float for mobile money transfer services (ZAP).

loans.name: Richar

texts.es: El señor Richar es empleado  en una empresa maderera como encargado de negocios. El crédito lo requiere para la compra una computadora portátil para realizar mejor su trabajo. Vive en casa de sus padres ubicada en la zona La Lomas en  la ciudad de la ciudad de La Paz; es soltero  y no tiene hijos. Esta es la segunda vez que su solicitud de crédito es canalizada a través de Kiva. Richar sigue estudiando en la Universidad de La Paz ya que con el anterior préstamo de Kiva pudo pagar la matrícula y mensualidades.
texts.en: Richar is employed by a lumber company as the business manager. He requires the loan to purchase a laptop computer to help him do his job. He lives in his parents' house which is located in the region of Las Lomas in the city of La Paz. He is single and he does not have children. It is the second time he requests a loan from Kiva. Richar continues to study university in La Paz. His previous Kiva loan was used to pay for his application and to make the monthly payments.

loans.use: to purchase a laptop to help him do his job.

loans.name: Muhwezi

texts.en:
Muhwezi is a 40-year-old married man with five children. He lives in his own house in Kamwenge, Uganda.

He has been trading in coffee for eight years and he is happy with the proceeds despite the challenge of limited funds. His desire is to own a coffee store that supplies the whole region. Muhwezi needs the loan to buy coffee to sell.

loans.use: To buy coffee to sell.

loans.name: Michael

texts.en:
This is 50-year-old Michael. He is married and has three children, aged 28, 25, and 20. Apart from his wife and children, he lives with his father. In 2004, Michael established his patient drugs business. He began his business because he wants to make himself independent and be able to provide a livelihood for his family. Working seven days a week and 15 hours a day, he earns about 880,000 Sierra Leone leones (Le) every month from this business. 

He would like a loan in the amount of Le 4,000,000 in order to buy patient drugs. He hopes that this loan will enable him to increase his monthly profits by approximately Le 200,000. In the future, Michael plans to establish a modern pharmacy and have branches across the country. Inflation and the high cost of transportation are his major business challenges. He thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy patient drugs for his business.

loans.name: San Antonio Group

texts.es:
El comité fue formado gracias a que la señora Mercedes,  de  Ciudad del Este, al  enterarse sobre el programa de la Fundación, contactó con sus vecinas y amigas para formar el comité en la zona. De esto surgió la formación del comité denominado San Antonio, el cual actualmente cuenta con 16 integrantes, las cuales se encuentran desarrollando en tercer ciclo.
Todas ellas se unieron con el propósito de generar mas ingresos para poder de esa manera llevar el pan a sus casas. Todo lo que hacen es con miras a un futuro mejor para sus familias.
La Sra. Lilian se dedica a la peluquería en el barrio donde vive, por medio de su esfuerzo a logrado salir adelante y poder tener un poco mas de ingresos, ya que la peluquería la ayuda mucho. Sueña con algún dia poder ampliar su negocio y asi tener mas capacidad para mas clientes.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de insumos para utilizarlos dentro de la peluqueria, como ser gel, spray para pelo y demás.
texts.en:
This committee was formed thanks to the efforts of Sra. Mercedes, who is from Ciudad del Este. She learned about the program offered by Fundación Paraguaya and contacted her neighbors and friends about forming a local committee. What resulted was the formation of the committee named “San Antonio”, which currently has 16 members. They are participating in their third loan cycle.

All of the members have joined together so that they can generate more income to support their households. They do everything they can to create a better future for their families.

Sra. Lilian operates a beauty salon in the neighborhood where she lives. Through her efforts, she has been able to move forward and earn a little more income. Her beauty parlor has been a great help. She dreams of someday expanding her business so that she can accommodate more customers. Lilian is requesting a loan to buy supplies that are used in her salon such as gel, hair spray, and other products.

loans.use: to purchase supplies for her salon, such as gel and hair spray.

loans.name: Rusenyi Tweimukye Group

texts.en:
Benard is a 41-year-old married man living with six children in a semi permanent house in Fort Portal, Uganda. His dream is to build a permanent house and help his children to attain higher levels of education.

Benard operates a retail shop, which he started six years ago with 200,000 shillings. Now it is worth 2,500,000 shillings! Hardships he's encountered are price fluctuations and increasing house rent. His dream is to become a wholesaler. Benard needs this loan to buy sugar and soap to sell. 

Out of the 13 group members, only ten took the loan and three had to guarantee their group members, as it is a group policy.

loans.use: to buy sugar and soap for resale.

loans.name: Harukooto Tweimukye Group

texts.en:
Judith started her retail shop with 100,000 Ugandan shillings and has operated it for for 10 years. Her major challenge is the decline in purchasing power of clients due to hiked food prices, but she has hope for progressing in business. She needs this loan to buy more rice, sugar, beans and groundnuts for future resale.

Judith is 36 years old and married with four children. She lives in a semi-permanent, owned house in Fort Portal, Uganda. Her family goal is to expand her business to be able to educate her children to higher levels.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar and beans for sale.

loans.name: Augusta

texts.en:
Augusta is 52 years old and the single mother of one child. Her occupation is working for the state, which she has been doing for about 11 years. She is asking for a $500 loan so that she may make repairs to her house. She plans to purchase cement and begin expanding her house little by little. 

Augusta is a hardworking woman and is committed to making all of the necessary loan payments on time.

loans.use: to pay for repairs to her house.

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es: La señora Carmen es artesana y realiza el trenzado de mantas, también teje las mismas y es costurera. Es así como ella percibe sus ingresos mensuales. El crédito lo requiere para la compra una maquina de coser para terminar sus productos más rápido. Carmen nunca ha tenido un crédito en ninguna institución financiera, de tal manera que esta es la primera vez que tendrá una experiencia como ésta. Vive en casa propia ubicada en la zona Seke  en  la ciudad de El Alto;  es casada y tiene un hijo.
texts.en: Carmen is an artisan an she weaves blankets. She also knits blankets and she is a seamstress. This is how she earns her monthly income. She requires the loan to purchase a sewing machine to complete making her products faster. Carmen has never had a loan from any financial institution. This is the first time she will have an experience like this. She lives in a house of her own and it is located in the region of Seke in the city of El Alto. She is married and she has a son.

loans.use: to purchase a sewing machine for her sewing business.

loans.name: Bwavumpologoma Women' Group-Buikwe

texts.en:
Prisca has been working assiduously to obtain a firm footing for her green fruits and vegetables sales business over the past 20 years in Lugazi. A firm footing, being that this business is seasonal and one involved in it has to compete with other green fruit and vegetable traders. 

Prisca's courage and strong-willed determination have seen her survive in this tough business. Previously this congenial and warm-hearted married mother of seven had nothing she was doing to make ends meet. She was mostly engaged in a daily trivial round involving house chores. The fact that Prisca is a farmer who grows fruits and vegetables on her farm plays to her advantage. Prisca says her husband helps her out with her business. Weekly, this business makes her sales profits totaling up to Ugandan shillings 40,000, and monthly, her profits total up to Ugandan shillings 120,000.

With this Kiva loan, she says she is going to purchase more fruits and vegetable seeds to grow on her farm.

loans.use: to purchase more fruits and vegetable seeds to grow on her farm.

loans.name: Nila Abigail

texts.es:
Nila Abigail tiene 53 años, Es casada vive con el esposo y con cinco hijos de 25,23,19,16 y 9 años, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. TIERRA NUESTRA, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto San Luis de Zapotal, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto como siembre de maíz y arroz.

Nila se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz. Compra sus productos en Comercial AGRIPAC y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de semillas y abonos de maiz y arroz.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafíos como plagas en los cultivos y la falta de dinero para pagar a mas trabajadores. Su sueño es tener carro y darñes lña mejor educaicon a los hijos.

Le gusta jugar con la pelota, limpiar la casa y salñir de paseo con la familia.
texts.en:
Nila Abigail is 53 years old. She is married and lives with her husband and five children, who are 25, 23, 19, 16, and 9 years old. They live in the canton of Ventanas, province of Los Ríos.

The members of the "Tierra Nuestra" ["Our Land"] communal bank are located in the precinct of San Luis de Zapotal, which belongs to the canton of Ventanas. The members of this communal bank perform short-cycle agricultural work such as growing corn and rice.

Nila works in agriculture, planing corn and rice. She buys her supplies from the AGRIPAC company and sells her products at the wholesale market in Ventanas.

She is requesting a loan to help with planting corn and rice. She will buy seeds and fertilizers for her crops. The support provided by this loan will help her economically so that she can cover her needs. She faces challenges like crop plagues and a lack of money to pay more workers. Her dream is to have a car and to give her children a better education.

She enjoys playing ball, cleaning the house, and going out walking with her family.

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer for planting corn and rice

loans.name: Grace

texts.en: Grace is a 32-year-old single mother of a child, living in a rented house in Fort Portal, Uganda. She is charged with the responsibility of looking after her child, and her dream is to see him graduate from college. After realising that the meagre salary of a teacher was not sufficient to make a good living, she decided to venture into selling clothes, and she has been in this business for a year now. She has challenges in raising capital to meet the increasing demands of her customers. Her dream is to own a boutique. Grace needs this loan to buy clothes to sell.

loans.use: to buy clothes for resale.

loans.name: Nelson

texts.es:
El Sr. Nelson tiene 41 años, vive en la Ciudad de Concepción , tiene un hijo de 9 años quien vive con el.
El cliente tiene un lavadero desde hace mas de 1 año, también  un taller  de motos que le genera muy buenas ganancias. El es muy conocido en la ciudad, por lo que ya tiene muchos clientes quienes le traen sus autos para mandarlos lavar.
El se considera una persona de confianza, gracias a su honestidad está donde está. Le gustaría algún dia ampliar su negocio para poder tener mas capacidad para mas vehículos.
El solicita el crédito para la compra de los limpia autos que utiliza para la limpieza de los mismos. El esta muy esperanzado en el crédito, ya que le será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
Sr. Nelson is 41 years old and lives in the city of Concepción. He has a nine-year-old son who lives with him.

Nelson has managed a car wash for more than a year. He also owns a motorcycle workshop that generates very good revenues. Nelson is well-known in the city and has many customers who bring their cars to him to be washed. He is considered to be a trustworthy person because of his honesty. Someday he would like to expand his business so that he can accommodate more vehicles.

The loan he is requesting will be used to buy car wash supplies to use in his business. He is very hopeful that the loan will be of great help.

loans.use: to purchase car wash supplies.

loans.name: Tereza

texts.en: Tereza is a 38-year-old married woman with six children living in a permanent house in Fort Portal, Uganda.She is charged with the responsibility of looking after the family, and her desire is to educate her children up to university. For ten years, she has been selling food. Her major challenge is price fluctuation of agricultural products. Nevertheless, her dream is to own a food store. Tereza needs this loan to buy cassava, maize and millet flour for resale.

loans.use: to buy cassava, millet and maize flour for resale.

loans.name: Jhimmy

texts.es: El señor Jhimmy es chofer de taxi y está afiliado en el sindicato Simon Bolivar. Su esposa es empleada de una agencia Gubernamental dedicada al servico de agua potable a la ciudad de La Paz y recibe un salario mensual. De esta manera combinan los ingresos con ambas actividades para el sustento de la familia. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de un motor para así mantener en buen estado su movilidad. Jhimmy en casa propia la misma queda ubicada en la zona de San Pedro en la ciudad de La Paz; es casado y aún no tiene hijos. Es la primera vez que el cliente trabaja con IMPRO y también con Kiva.
texts.en: Jhimmy is a taxi driver and he is affiliated with the Simon Bolivar union. His wife is employed by a government agency dedicated to the potable water services in the city of La Paz. She earns a monthly income. They combine the income from both of their activities for the support of the family. He requires the loan to purchase an engine to keep his car in a good state of repair. Jhimmy lives in a house of his own which is located in the region of San Pedro in the city of La Paz. He is married and he still do not have children. It is the first time he works with Impro (Kiva Field Partner) and with Kiva.

loans.use: to purchase an engine for his taxi cab.

loans.name: Bertila

texts.es:
Bertila tiene 61 años D. edad, vive en casa propia, junto a su esposa e hijos, en el distrito D. Chiclayo, en una zona rural D. este. Bertila y su familia gozan D. buenas referencias personales, por ser personas trabajadoras y por la unión que existe entre ellos.

Bertila se dedica a la agricultura y cuenta con varios años D. experiencia en este rubro. Actualmente, cultiva arroz y tiene clientes establecidos que compran su producto. 

La demanda D. Bertila ha crecido y es por ello que solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito D. 1500 nuevos soles que le permitirá invertir en su cultivo D. arroz, comprando fertilizantes para mejorar su cosecha.

Bertila es un cliente conocido D. nuestra entidad y tiene buenas referencias.
texts.en:
Bertila is 61 years old and he lives in a house of his own, together with is wife and children. It is located in the district of Chiclayo, an eastern rural region. Bertila and his family enjoy good personal references. They are hardworking people who have strong family ties among themselves.

Bertila is an agriculturist and he has many years' experience in this field. Currently he is cultivating rice and he already has established clients who buy his product.

Bertila has seen an increase in demand and it is why he requests a loan from Edpyme Alternativa (Kiva Field Partner) in the amount of 1500 nuevos soles. It will help him invest in his rice cultivation with the purchase of fertilizers to improve the harvest.

Bertila is a well known client by our organization and he has good references.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers for his rice plantation.

loans.name: Friday

texts.en: Friday is a 45-year-old married man with three children living in a permanent house in Fort Portal, Uganda. His dream is to educate his children. He has been working in the transport sector for three years now. With the income generated, he has been able to provide the basics for his family. His challenges are mechanical breakdowns, and his desire is to own at least three motorcycles. Friday needs this loan to buy a motorcycle.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Maria Francisca

texts.es:
Maria Francisca tiene 57 años, Es soltera vive con la hija , en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. TIERRA NUESTRA, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto San Luis de Zapotal, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto como siembre de maíz y arroz.

Maria se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz. Compra sus productos en Comercial AGRIPAC y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de semillas y abonos de maiz y arroz.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafíos como plagas en los cultivos y la falta de dinero para pagar a mas trabajadores. Su sueño es comprar un carro para el trabajo.

Le gusta ver la television.
texts.en:
Maria Francisca is 57 years old, single, and lives with her daughter in the canton of Ventanas in Los Ríos Province.

The members of the Communal Bank “Tierra Nuestra” (Our Land) meet in the neighborhood of San Luis de Zapotal, which is part of the canton of Ventanas. This Communal Bank consists of short-cycle farmers who grow corn and rice.

Maria is a farmer who grows corn and rice. She buys her products at the AGRIPAC commercial center and sells at the wholesale market in Ventanas.

The loan she is requesting will be used for planting corn and rice. She plans to buy seeds and compost for her corn and rice crops. With the financial assistance provided through this loan, she will be able to acquire needed supplies. The challenges she faces include diseases that could impact her crops and the lack of money to pay for more workers. Her dream is to buy a car to use for her work.

Maria enjoys watching television.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and compost for planting corn and rice.

loans.name: Juana Ysidora

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MAMA SIMONA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Juana Isidora; ella tiene 53 años de edad y es casada y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de fruta, ella vende manzanas,naranjas,uvas y plátanos y también la socia vende carne de cordero, ella vende en forma ambulatoria desde las 9:00 a.m hasta las 5:00 p.m,por medio de estos pequeños negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de carne y venta de fruta. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar carne y comprar fruta al por mayor.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Here is a member of the communal bank "Mama Simona". It is located in the district of Cusco, belonging to the province of Cusco and the department of Cusco. 

Her name is Juana Ysidora. She is 53 years old, married, and she has 4 children. She alternates her daily activities with her fruit sales business. She sells apples, oranges, grapes, and bananas. She also sells lamb meat. She makes her sales itinerantly from 9am to 5pm. It is through these small businesses that she is able to provide for her children. She wants to expand her meat sales and fruit sales business. He requests this loan to purchase meat and fruits in wholesale.

She is happy for the loan and she is committed to making her loan payments.

loans.use: to purchase meat and fruits in wholesale.

loans.name: Marcela Dolores

texts.es:
Marcela es una joven madre de familia de 23 años de edad. Ella vive junto a su novio y 2 hijos en la zona rural del distrito de Reque en Chiclayo. En esta comunidad la actividad principal es la agricultura y ganadería.

Marcela se dedica a la crianza de aves de corral,  desde hace 6 años, en un espacio ubicado en la parte trasera de su casa. Además, obtiene otros ingresos, producto de sus labores realizadas en una hacienda de la zona. Estos ingresos sumados a los de su novio, le permiten a Marcela mantener a su familia.

Marcela tiene muchos deseos de mejorar su calidad de vida y gracias a su esfuerzo ha logrado arreglar su pequeña casa poco a poco. 

Ella solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 800 nuevos soles que utilizará para continuar arreglando su vivienda y para comprarle alimento balanceado a sus aves.

Marcela es una cliente recurrente de nuestra entidad y los préstamos otorgados le han permitido mejorar su calidad de vida y negocio. Goza de buenas referencias personales y crediticias.
texts.en:
Marcela is a young 23 year old mother. She lives with her boyfriend and 2 children in a rural area of the district of Reque in Chiclayo. In this community the main activity is farming and livestock. 

Marcela has raised poultry for 6 years in a space located in the back of her house. She also obtains other income from working in the area. These incomes, together with her boyfriend's, allow MArcela to support her family.

Marcela really wants to improve her quality of life and thanks to her hard work has been able to fix her little house little by little.   

She is asking Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 800 nuevos soles which she will use to continue fixing up her house and to buy balanced feed for her birds. 

Marcela is a recurring client of our agency and the loans made to her have allowed her to improve her quality of life and her business. She has good personal and credit references.

loans.use: to fix her house and buy balanced feed.

loans.name: Kwimage Group

texts.en: Mwanaisha, who is in her early 20s, is single. She has been running a food sales business for one year now. She works from 6 am to 4 pm daily and is able to make a small monthly profit. This will be her first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania, which she wants to use to buy 25 kilos of wheat flour, 25 kilos of baking flour, 25 kilos of rice, a small bucket of cooking oil and charcoal. Her dream is to be able to buy furniture for the room she is about to rent. She will share this loan with her loan group Kwimage which has a total of 17 members who will hold each other accountable in paying back their loans.

loans.use: to buy 25 kilos of wheat flour, 25 kilos of baking flour, 25 kilos of rice, a small bucket of cooking oil and charcoal.

loans.name: Marilin

texts.es:
Marilin es una joven madre de 24 años de edad. Ella vive en casa propia junto a su novio e hijo en una pequeña comunidad rural perteneciente al distrito de Tambogrande – Piura.

Marilin se dedica a la preparación y venta de salchi-pollo y salchi-papas, estos son pequeños platos de comida hechos a base de hotdog picado y mezclado con pollo o con papa. Esta actividad la realiza en su propio domicilio y atiende a una clientela ya establecida, los fines de semana.

Marilin tiene muchos deseos de superación y es por ello que solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles, que invertirá en la compra de insumos para realizar sus platos de comida.

Marilin es una clienta conocida para nuestra entidad, este sería su segundo crédito y el primero lo canceló puntualmente.
texts.en:
Marilin is a young 24 year old mother. She lives in her own house with her boyfriend and son in a small rural community that belongs to the district of Tambogrande – Piura.

Marilin works making and selling chicken and sausage and fries and sausage. These small dishes are made with cut up hotdogs mixed with chicken or with french fries. She does this activity in her own house and serves her already established clientele on weekends.

Marilin really wants to get ahead and that is why she is asking Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 1000 nuevos soles, which she will invest in buying ingredients to make her food.  

Marilin is a client who is known to our agency. This would be her second loan and she paid off the first one on time.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to prepare food.

loans.name: Juan

texts.es: El señor Juan trabaja en la policía nacional y también trabaja como guardia de seguridad privada. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de material de construcción (cemento, arena, ladrillos, fierro, estuco, etc.) ya que construirá tres habitaciones en la planta alta de su casa. Vive en casa propia ubicada en la zona Pasankeri de la ciudad de La Paz; es casado  y tiene tres hijos. Es la primera vez que obtiene un crédito en IMPRO y se lo canaliza a través de Kiva.
texts.en: Juan works for the national police and also works as a private security guard. He needs the loan to buy construction materials (cement, sand, bricks, iron, stucco, etc) since he will build three rooms on the upstairs level of his house. He lives in his own house located in the Pasankeri area in the city of La Paz. He is married and has three children. This is the first time he has obtained a loan with IMPRO and through the Kiva channels.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, iron, bricks and other materials to build three rooms in his house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To clear for next season's planting.

loans.name: Luz Maria

texts.es:
Luz tiene 28 años D. edad, está casada y es madre D. 4 niños. Esta familia vive en una pequeña comunidad rural en vías D. desarrollo del distrito D. TambogranD.- Piura.

Luz se dedica a la crianza D. ovinos y aves D. corral, que luego comercializa en el mercado local. Esta actividad la realiza desD. hace 2 años, la buena crianza que les da a sus animales, en corrales ubicado en la parte posterior D. su casa, han hecho que Luz cuente con clientela establecida.

Luz solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito D. 800 nuevos soles que utilizará en la compra D. alimento balanceado para sus aves y ovinos, con la finalidad D. que estos tengan mayor tamaño para venderlos a mejores precios.

Luz goza D. buenas referencias personales, tiene muchos deseos D. mejorar su calidad D. vida y el desarrollo óptimo D. su negocio se lo permitirá.
texts.en:
Luz is 28 years old, is married and is mother to four children. This family lives in a small, rural community in a developing area of the TambogranD.-Piura district.

Luz is dedicated to raising sheep and poultry that she sells in the local market. She has performed this work for two years. The good care that she gives her animals, in corrals located in the rear of her home, has allowed Luz to count on an established customer base.

Luz is requesting from Edpyme Alternativa a loan of 800 new "soles" that she will use for the purchase of feed for her poultry and sheep, with the goal that they will be a bigger size so she can sell them at higher prices.

Luz enjoys good personal references. She has many wishes to improve her quality of life and the optimal development of her business will allow that.

loans.use: to buy feed.

loans.name: Julia Elena

texts.es:
Julia tiene 39 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo y  3 hijos en una pequeña comunidad rural del distrito de Tambogrande – Piura.

Julia se dedica a la crianza y venta de cerdos, en corrales espaciosos ubicados en la parte trasera de su vivienda. Ella cuenta con clientela establecida que son principalmente los pobladores de su comunidad y alrededores. Además, Julia cuenta con terreno agrícola en el cual cosecha limón semanalmente, para luego comercializar en el mercado local.

Ambas actividades le permiten mantener su hogar y para continuar con un buen desarrollo de estas, Julia solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 500 nuevos soles para comprar alimento balanceado para sus animales y fertilizantes para su cosecha de limón. 

Julia tiene muchos deseos de mejorar la calidad de vida de su familia y este crédito le sería de gran ayuda.
texts.en:
Julia is 39 years old and lives with her husband and three children in a small, rural community in the district of Tambogrande-Piura.

Julia is dedicated to raising and selling pigs in spacious pens located in the area behind her house. She has an established customer base that are mainly the residents of her community and surrounding areas. Additionally, Julia has farm land where she harvests lemons weekly which she then sells in the local market.

Both activities allow her to support her home and, to continue with the good development, Julia is requesting from Edpyme Alternativa a loan of 500 new "soles" to buy feed for her animals and fertilizers for her lemon crops.

Julia has many wishes to improve the quality of life of her family and this loan would be a great help.

loans.use: to purchase feed and fertilizer.

loans.name: Maria Del Rosario

texts.es:
Rosario es una madre de familia de 27 años de edad. Ella vive en el distrito Las Arenas en Piura, esta es una comunidad rural en vías de desarrollo. Rosario vive junto a su esposo y sus 4 hijos, 3 de ellos se encuentran en edad escolar.

Rosario se dedica a la compra y venta de animales, aves de corral y cerdos. Además, ella produce y comercializa harina, chicha de jora (la jora es un maíz que se encuentra en la zona norte del Perú) y pequeños platos de comida, en su propio domicilio o haciendo entregas en la ciudad de Piura. Cuenta con 5 años de experiencia en el negocio y tiene clientela fija. 	

Rosario solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles para comprar el alimento balanceado que sus aves y cerdos requieren, para llegar a un peso y tamaño adecuado. Otra parte del crédito será invertida en la compra de insumos para los alimentos que Rosario produce. 

Rosario es una mujer trabajadora que goza de buenas referencias, por el  empeño que pone al realizar sus actividades.
texts.en:
Rosario is a mother who is 27 years old. She lives in the Las Arenas district in Piura. This is a developing, rural community. Rosario lives with her husband and four children, three of whom are of school age.

Rosario is dedicated to buying and selling animals, poultry and pigs. Additionally, she produces and sells flour,"chicha de jora" (jora is a maize found in the northern area of Peru) and small dishes in her own house or going into the city of Piura. She has five years of experience with the business and has a fixed customer list.

Rosario is requesting from Edpyme Alternativa a loan of 1000 new "soles" to buy feed that her birds and pigs need so they can reach an adequate weight and size. Another part of the loan will be invested in the purchase of ingredients for the dishes that Rosario produces.

Rosario is a hard-working woman who enjoys good references for the commitment that she makes to her work.

loans.use: to buy feed and ingredients to make food.

loans.name: Juana Gregoria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MAMA SIMONA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Juana Gregoria; ella tiene 41 años de edad y es casada y tiene 5 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de verduras como cebollas, tomates, pepinos, zanahorias entre otras verduras y también la socia tiene un negocio de venta de animales como ganados y cuyes y lo vende en forma ambulatoria, por medio de estos negocios la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de verduras y venta de animales. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar verduras y alimentos para los animales.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the "Mama Simona" community bank. The bank is located in the district of Cusco, belonging to the province and department of Cusco.

The member is Juana Gregoria. She is 41 years old and is married and has five children. She alternates her daily work with the business selling vegetables such as onions, tomatoes, cucumbers, carrots among other vegetables and she also has a business selling animals like cattle and guinea pigs and she sells them on foot. Through these businesses she gets her children ahead. She wants to expand her vegetable and animal business. She is requesting a loan to buy vegetables and feed for the animals.

The member is happy for the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to buy vegetables and feed for the animals.

loans.name: Julio Ricardo

texts.es:
Julio es un cliente de 61 años de edad, es un hombre trabajador que vive en el distrito de Chepén en La Libertad. El lugar donde vive Julio se encuentra en la ciudad y es una zona tranquila.

Julio se dedica a la producción y venta de pan. Esta actividad la realiza desde su propio domicilio y lleva más de 15 años de experiencia en ella, lo que lo ha llevado a tener una clientela establecida. 

Julio desea invertir en su negocio y por eso solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2500 nuevos soles que invertirá en la reparación de su horno artesanal, en la compra de manteca para sus panes y en el acondicionamiento de su puesto.

Con este préstamo Julio desea aumentar sus ingresos para mejorar su calidad de vida. Él aspira a tener la mejor panadería de la zona y no se encuentra muy lejos de esa realidad.

Julio es un cliente con más de 9 créditos cancelados con puntualidad, que nuestra entidad le ha brindado y que le han servido para el desarrollo de su negocio.
texts.en:
Julio is a 61 year old client.  He is a hard-working man, and he lives in the Chepén district in La Libertad.  The place where Julio lives is in the city, and it is a peaceful area.

Julio makes and sells bread.  He does this from his own home.  He has over 15 years of experience, and this has led him to have regular customers.

Julio wishes to invest in his business.  That is why he is requesting a loan for 2,500 soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  He will use the loan to repair his oven, to buy shortening for his bread, and to refurbish his place.

With this loan Julio wishes to increase his income in order to improve his quality of life.  He aspires to have the best bakery in the area, and it will not be very long before this is true.

He is a client with over nine loans from Edpyme Alternativa, which he has punctually paid back.  The loans have served him in the development of his business.

loans.use: to repair his oven and to buy supplies.

loans.name: James

texts.en: James is a 28-year-old enterprising man living in a rented house in Fort Portal, Uganda. His family goal is to build a house and marry. For seven years he has been in a motorcycle transport business, and this has enabled him to give a helping hand to his parents in raising his siblings. He has a challenge with continuous mechanical breakdown of his motorcycle, and his desire is to buy a new one. James wants this loan to buy a motorcycle.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Blanca Lidia

texts.es:
Blanca tiene 57 años D. edad, es viuda y tiene un hijo, con el cual vive en el distrito  D. TambogranD. – Piura.

Blanca se dedica a la venta D. calzado, para damas, caballeros y niños, en su propio domicilio, donD. atienD. todos los días D. la semana a clientela ya establecida en la zona. Esta actividad la realiza hace más D. 5 años. Además, cría ganado vacuno teniendo y actualmente cuenta con 2 vacas. 

Blanca solicita un crédito D. 1200 nuevos soles para invertir en su negocio. Desea comprar calzado para incrementar sus ventas diarias y seguir creciendo en su actividad. Blanca tiene muchos deseos D. superación y D. mejorar su calidad D. vida. 

Blanca es una cliente conocida D. nuestra entidad, su crédito anterior lo canceló puntualmente.
texts.en:
Blanca is a 57 year old widow.  She has a son, and they live together in the TambogranD. – Piura district.

Blanca sells women’s, men’s, and children’s shoes in her own home.  She attends to the business every day of the week, and she has regular customers in the area.  She has been doing this for over five years.  She also raises cattle, and she currently has two cows.

Blanca is requesting a loan for 1,200 soles to invest in her business.  She wishes to buy shoes in order to increase her daily sales and to keep growing in her business activity.  Blanca has a lot of desire for self-improvement and for improving her quality of life.

Blanca is a known client of our institution.  She paid her previous loan punctually.

loans.use: to buy shoes.

loans.name: Edinson Miguel

texts.es:
Miguel es un joven emprendedor de 24 años de edad. Él vive con su madre en la parte rural del distrito de Lambayeque y se dedica a la preparación y venta de Kingkong (postre típico del norte del Perú, hecho a base de galleta y manjar blanco), galletas y dulces.

Miguel realiza esta actividad desde hace 3 años, en un espacio acondicionado en su domicilio. Él cuenta con clientela establecida en Chiclayo y Lambayeque.

Miguel solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles, con el que comprará una máquina de amasar para la elaboración de sus productos. Esto le permitirá realizar una mayor cantidad y por lo tanto incrementar sus ventas. Miguel cuenta con clientela fija en la zona.

Miguel es un cliente antiguo de nuestra entidad y presenta un historial crediticio bueno.
texts.en:
Miguel, age 24, is an enterprising young man.  He lives with his mother in the rural part of the Lambayeque district.  He makes and sells “Kingkong” (a typical dessert in the northern part of Peru, made from a base of cookies and blancmange), cookies, and sweets.

Miguel has been engaged in this business activity for three years.  He works in a well set up space in his home.  He has regular customers in Chiclayo and Lambayeque.

Miguel is requesting a loan for 2,000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  He will use the loan to buy a mixer to make his products.  This will allow him to make a greater quantity and, therefore, increase his sales.  Miguel has regular customers in the area.

Miguel is a long-time client of our institution, and he has a good credit history.

loans.use: to buy a mixer.

loans.name: Juana Isabel

texts.es:
Isabel es una madre de familia de 50 años de edad. Ella vive en casa de su suegra con sus 2 hijos. Esta casa se encuentra en el distrito de José Leonardo Ortiz en Chiclayo. Esta es una zona urbana en vías de desarrollo, cuya principal actividad es el comercio.

Isabel cuenta, desde hace 3 años, con un puesto de venta de abarrotes (arroz, leche, golosinas, productos de higiene personal, etc.) en el mercado Moshoqueque, el mercado popular con mayor régimen de ventas en el norte del Perú.

Isabel solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles que invertirá en la compra de mercadería (productos de primera necesidad) para su negocio, pues cuenta con una buena demanda de productos, y en arreglos en el interior de su casa.

Isabel es una mujer con muchos deseos de superación, este sería el tercer crédito brindado por nuestra entidad.
texts.en:
Isabel is a 50 year old mom, she lives at her mother in law’s house with her two children.
The house is in the district of Jose Leonardo Ortiz in Chiclayo.  This is an urban zone in development where the main activity is commerce.
For three years Isabel has had a stand selling basic need products at the Moshoqueque market, which is the most popular market with the largest sales in the North of Peru.
Isabel requests a loan of 1000 new soles from Edpyme Alternativa that she will invest in purchasing merchandise for her business, her products are in good demand and she will also do some renovations to the house.
Isabel is a woman with dreams to progress, this would be her third loan with us.

loans.use: to purchase groceries such as rice, milk, and cookies for her store

loans.name: Umoja Kigogo Group

texts.en:
Zainabu,who is in her late 20s is married with three children; two of them are still at school. She has been selling cosmetics for three years now. She works from 9 a.m. to 7 p.m. daily and is able to make a small monthly profit.

This will be her 2nd loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. She used the previous loan to buy cement to make bricks, increased on cosmetics stock and has paid back her loan successfully.  She hopes for a loan to buy more cosmetics and to buy madila (Muslim type of dresses), to sell next month during the muslim fasting period. Her dream is to one day be able to buy a land. 

She will share this loan with her loan group "Umoja Kigogo" which has a total of 15 members, who will hold each other accountable in paying back their loans.

loans.use: To buy more cosmetics and to buy madila (Muslim type of dresses).

loans.name: Rosine

texts.en: Rosine is a 35-year-old Rwandan entrepreneur that is married with two children, ages 3 and 6. Her husband is a technician and both of their children are in school. For three years, she has been running a business buying and selling fruit. She plans to use this loan to purchase oranges, tree tomatoes, citrus fruits, and mangoes that she will sell to meet the growing demand of her business.

loans.use: to buy fruit such as citrus fruits, mangoes, tree tomatoes, etc.

loans.name: Luis

texts.es:
Luis es un hombre honrado y trabajador de 59 años de edad. Él vive junto a su esposa e hijo en una casa ubicada en el distrito de Sullana- Piura, en la parte rural de es te.

La actividad que desarrolla  Luis  es la agricultura, el cultiva limón desde hace 4 año. Además, se dedica a la crianza de animales que luego comercializa en el mercado de su localidad. Su familia lo ayuda en las actividades y esto ha llevado al progreso sus negocios.

Luis solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles que utilizará en la compra de fertilizantes para su cultivo de limón, también comprará alimento balanceado para que sus animales tengan un óptimo desarrollo que le permita comercializarlos a mejores precios.

Luis tiene muchos deseos de superación y de mejorar su calidad de vida, goza de buenas referencias por parte de sus conocidos y  vecinos.
texts.en:
Luis is an honest and hard-working man of 59. He lives together with his wife and son in a house located in the district of Sullana-Piura, in the rural eastern part. 

The activity which Luis pursues is agriculture: he has grown limes for 4 years. He also works raising animals, which he later sells in the market of his community. His family helps him with his work, and this has led to the progress of his business. 

Luis is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternativa in the amount of 1000 Peruvian new soles, which he will use to buy fertilizers for his lime crop, as well as balanced feed so that his animals will have optimal development, allowing him to sell them for better prices. 

Luis has a great desire to get ahead and improve his quality of life. He has excellent references from his neighbors and others who know him.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and balanced animal feed.

loans.name: Wilmer

texts.es:
Wilmer es un hombre trabajador de 28 años de edad, es soltero y vive en casa de sus padres quienes son agricultores. La casa está ubicada en una pequeña comunidad rural, del distrito de Tambogrande – Piura, que no cuenta con los servicios básicos de saneamiento y electricidad.

Wilmer se dedica a  la crianza de ganado ovino y aves de corral, que luego comercializa a los pobladores de la zona y en el mercado de la localidad. Wilmer cuenta con clientela establecida y tiene mucha esperanza en su negocio, es por ello que ha decidido invertir en él.

Wilmer solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 1000 nuevos soles que utilizará para comprar  más ovejas, pues cuenta con suficiente espacio para criarlas. Wilmer goza de buenas referencias personales debido al empreño  que realiza en su labor.  Él estaría muy agradecido de concedérsele el crédito pues le será de gran ayuda.

Wilmer tiene muchos deseos de superación.
texts.en:
Wilmer is a hard-working 28-year-old man, who is single, and lives in the house of his parents who are farmers. Their house is located in a small rural community in the Tambogrande-Piura district that has basic sanitary sewer and electricity services.

Wilmer raises sheep and farm fowl, then sells them in the local market to the residents of the zone. Wilmer counts on an established clientèle and has much hope for his business. It is for that reason that he decided to invest in it.

Wilmer approached Edpyme Alternative for a loan of 1,000 new sols to buy more sheep, since he has sufficient space to raise them.  Wilmer has good personal references, owing to the effort he puts into his work. He would be very grateful if we conceded the credit, since it will be of great help to him.

Wilmer has much desire to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy sheep to raise and sell.

loans.name: Liz Yocelin

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MAMA SIMONA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Liz Yocelin; ella tiene 19 años de edad y es soltera; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de golosinas, ella vende en una carreta donde vende caramelos, chupetes, galletas y refrescos en el distrito de Poroy, ella vende desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia quiere ahorrar para que estudie la carrera profesional de sistemas. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar golosinas y para pagar algunas mensualidades de sus estudios.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en: Liz Yocelin belongs to the "Mama Simona" community bank in the district of Cusco, Peru. She is 19 years old and single. She balances her household responsibilities with her business selling snacks. She has a cart from which she sells caramels, lollipops, cookies and refreshments in the district of Poroy. She works from 7 a.m. until 6 p.m. Liz hopes through the business she can save to study for a professional degree. She is requesting the loan to purchase snacks and to pay off some of her school expenses. She is happy about the loan and promises to make her payments on time.

loans.use: to purchase snacks and to pay off some of her school expenses.

loans.name: Oswaldo

texts.es:
Oswaldo tiene 55 años, Es casado vive con la esposa y con los hijos, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. TIERRA NUESTRA, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto San Luis de Zapotal, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto como siembre de maíz y arroz.

Oswaldo se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz. Compra sus productos en Comercial AGRIPAC y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de semillas y abonos de maiz y arroz.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafíos como plagas en los cultivos y la falta de dinero para pagar a mas trabajadores. Su sueño es exportar los productos.

Le gusta escuchar musica y bailar.
texts.en:
Oswaldo is 55 years old, married, and lives with his wife and children in the canton of Ventanas in Los Ríos Province.

The members of the Communal Bank “Tierra Nuestra” (Our Land) meet in the neighborhood of San Luis de Zapotal, which is part of the canton of Ventanas. This Communal Bank consists of short-cycle farmers who grow corn and rice.

Oswaldo is a farmer who grows corn and rice. He buys his products at the AGRIPAC commercial center and sells at the wholesale market in Ventanas.

The loan he is requesting will be used for planting corn and rice. He plans to buy seeds and compost for his corn and rice crops. With the financial assistance provided through this loan, he will be able to acquire needed supplies. The challenges he faces include diseases that could impact his crops and the lack of money to pay for more workers. His dream is to export his products.

Oswaldo enjoys listening to music and dancing.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and compost for planting corn and rice.

loans.name: Ignacio

texts.es:
Ignacio es un padre de familia de 54 años de edad. Él vive junto a su esposa e hijo en una comunidad rural llamada Morropón en Piura. Esta familia goza de buenas referencias pues son muy unidos y trabajadores.

Ignacio se dedica a la compra y venta de cervezas. Este negocio le ha traído buenas recompensas que le han ayudado a mejorar su calidad de vida. Es por ello que desea seguir invirtiendo en él y ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles que invertirá en la compra de cerveza y en otro negocio de compra de maíz en grano que luego comercializa.

Ignacio recibe el apoyo de su esposa en las actividades que realiza, las cuales son el sustento del hogar, es por ello que este crédito le sería de mucha ayuda a su familia.

Ignacio es un cliente recurrente de nuestra institución y goza de buenas referencias crediticias por su puntualidad a la hora de cancelar los préstamos.
texts.en:
Ignacio is a 54 year old husband and father. He lives with his wife and son in a rural community called Morropón en Piura. This family has good references and is very close and hardworking.

Ignacio buys and sells beer. This business has brought him good earnings that have helped him improve his quality of life. That is why he wants to keep investing in it. He has asked Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 2000 nuevos soles that he will invest in buying beer and for another business, kernel corn that he will later sell.  

Ignacio has the support of his wife in the activities that he does, with which he supports the home. That is why this loan would be a big help for the family. 

Ignacio is a recurring client of our institution and he has good credit references because he pays his loans off on time.

loans.use: to buy beer and kernel corn to sell.

loans.name: Luis Enrique

texts.es:
Luis es un cliente de 37 años de edad, esta casado y tiene dos hijos menores. Esta familia vive en la zona rural de Morropón en Piura, gozan de buenas referencias personales en su comunidad.

Luis se dedica a brindar el servicio de mototaxi. Este es un servicio de transporte público muy popular en las pequeñas comunidades del Perú, pues las motos, que cuentan con una cabina en la parte trasera donde se llevan los pasajeros, recorren distancias cortas. Luis desarrolla esta actividad desde hace 4 años en su comunidad y alrededores  y cuenta con clientela establecida.

Luis solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un préstamo de 2000 nuevos soles que invertirá en el mantenimiento de su moto y en reparaciones en el interior de su vivienda.

Este préstamo le ayudará a mejorar su negocio y su calidad de vida. Luis ya ha trabajado con nuestra institución, cancelando sus cuotas adecuadamente.
texts.en:
Luis is a 37 year old client who is married and has two minor children. This family family lives in the rural area of Morropón en Piura. They have good personal references in their community.   

Luis works offering a motorcycle taxi. This is a public transportation service that is very popular in the small communities of Peru. Motorcycles with a cabin in the back carry passengers over short distances. Luis has done this activity for 4 years in his community and its surrounding areas and he has an established clientele.  

Luis is asking Edpyme Alternativa for a loan of 2000 nuevos soles which he will invest in motorcycle maintenance and interior home repair. 

This loan will help him improve his business and his quality of life. Luis has already worked with our institution and has made his payments on time.

loans.use: to do motorcycle maintenance and home repair.

loans.name: Julio Daniel

texts.es:
Julio Daniel tiene 32 años, Es casado vive con la esposa y con dos hijos de 8 y 3 años, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. TIERRA NUESTRA, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto San Luis de Zapotal, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto como siembre de maíz y arroz.

Julio Daniel se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz. Compra sus productos en Comercial AGRIPAC y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de semillas y abonos de maiz y arroz.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafíos como plagas en los cultivos y la falta de dinero para pagar a mas trabajadores. Su sueño es aumentar la produccion.

Le gusta fuhar indor.
texts.en:
Julio Daniel is 32 years old, married, and lives with his wife and two children ages 8 and 3 in Ventanas, located in the Los Ríos province.

The members of the “OUR LAND” cooperative bank can be found located in the precinct of San Luis de Zapotal, which belongs to the canton of Ventanas.  This area dedicates itself to farming tasks related to short cycle crops such as corn and rice.

Julio Daniel is a farmer who plants corn and rice.  He buys his products from the AGRIPAC corporation, and sells them at the wholesale market of Ventanas.

He requests the loan to plant corn and rice, so he can purchase seeds and fertilizers for corn and rice.  The support from this credit would help him financially in order to supply his needs.  He faces challenges such as crop plagues and a lack of funds to pay for more workers.  

His dream is to augment his production.

loans.use: buy seeds and fertilizers for corn and rice.

loans.name: Oscar Jaime

texts.es:
Oscar en un diciembre viaja a Medellín a visitar a su hermana y ella le pide que le ayude en su negocio que queda en centro como vendedor, para el fue una excelente experiencia y decide quedarse en Medellín y montar su propio negocio.

El desde hace 8 años el tiene un puesto de venta de cacharro que le permite sostener a su hijo y darle todo lo que necesita para su estudio y sus necesidades personales.

El quiere tener un mayor surtido para su negocios para que se pueda ver mas bonito y además así le puede ofrecer mas variedad de productos para sus clientes.
texts.en:
One December, Oscar traveled to Medellín to visit his sister.  She asked him to help her with her business, located in the center of town, as a merchant.  For him, it was an excellent experience and he decided to stay in Medellín to start his own business.

For 8 years, he has had a stand selling gadgets that has allowed him to support his son and provide him with everything he requires for his education and personal needs.

He wants to have a larger supply for his business, so it will look nicer and also allow him to offer a greater variety of products to his customers.

loans.use: purchase merchandise.

loans.name: Beatha

texts.en:
Beatha is a 32-year-old Rwandan entrepreneur who is married and has four children between the ages of 2 and 12. Her husband is a driver, and all of their children are in school. 

For three years, Beatha has been successfully selling honey. She will use this loan to purchase more honey that she can sell to meet the growing demand of her customers. With the profits from this loan, she plans to pay the school fees for her children and begin saving for the future of herself and her family. As a business woman, she aspires to open her own store in the future.

loans.use: To buy honey for sale.

loans.name: Angelica Noemi

texts.es:
Angélica es una mujer trabajadora de 33 años de edad. Ella es madre soltera y vive con sus 2 hijos en la zona rural del distrito de Paijan- La Libertad. Goza de buenas referencias por parte de sus vecinos y conocidos, quienes la consideran una personas trabajadora y responsable.

Angélica se dedica a la venta de frutas, desde hace 3 años, en el mercado de su comunidad. Afortunadamente, cuenta con clientela establecida que diariamente compra sus productos. Ella desea invertir en su negocio para que este crezca y es por ello que solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles que le permitirá comprar frutas y acondicionar su puesto de trabajo.

Angélica tiene muchos deseos de sacar adelante a su familia y de darles una mejor educación a sus hijos, por eso pone mucho empeño en su negocio para obtener mayores ganancias que le permitan cumplir sus metas.
texts.en:
Angélica is a hard-working, 33 year old woman.  She is a single mother and lives with her two children in the rural district of Paijan, La Libertad.  She enjoys good references from her neighbors and acquaintances who regard her as hard-working and responsible. 

Angélica has been selling fruit at her community market for three years.  Fortunately, she has established customers who buy her products daily.   She wants to invest in her business so that it grows and so she is requesting a loan of 1000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  The loan will enable her to buy fruit and set up her work space. 

Angélica has a strong desire to help her family get ahead and to provide her children with a better education.  For this reason, she puts a great deal of effort into her business so that she will earn better profits and be able to accomplish her goals.
.

loans.use: to buy fruit and set up her work space.

loans.name: Elvis Alexis

texts.es:
Elvis Alexis tiene 20 años, Es soltero vive con los padres no tiene hijos, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. TIERRA NUESTRA, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto San Luis de Zapotal, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto como siembre de maíz y arroz.

Elvis se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz. Compra sus productos en Comercial AGRIPAC y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de semillas y abonos de maiz y arroz.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafíos como plagas en los cultivos y la falta de dinero para pagar a mas trabajadores. Su sueño es tener comprar un carro y una casa.

Le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Elvis Alexis is 20 years old.  He is single, lives with his parents, doesn’t have children and lives in the Ventanas canton in the province of Los Ríos.

The members of the “OUR LAND” cooperative bank find themselves located in the San Luis de Zapotal precinct, belonging to the canton of Ventanas.  This area dedicates itself to agricultural tasks related to short cycle crops such as corn and rice.

Elvis dedicates himself to farming, planting corn and rice.  He buys his products at the AGRIPAC corporation, and sells them at the wholesale market of Ventanas.

He requests this loan to plant corn and rice, to buy seeds and fertilizers.  The support of this loan would help him financially to supply his needs.  He faces challenges such as crop plagues and a lack of funds to pay for more workers.  His dreams are to buy a car and a house.

He enjoys playing sports.

loans.use: buy seeds and fertilizers for his corn and rice crops.

loans.name: Rafaela

texts.es:
Rafaela es una mujer emprendedora D. 53 años D. edad, goza D. buenas referencias personales en su comunidad. Comunidad dedicada al comercio, agricultura y ganadería que pertenece a la provincia D. Chiclayo, esta es la comunidad D. Zaña. 

Rafaela se dedica a la crianza y comercialización D. aves D. aves D. corral. Ella cuenta con clientela establecida a la cual venD. sus animales una vez que estos alcanzan el tamaño y peso ideal. Debido a la buena crianza que Rafaela les da a sus aves, ahora cuenta con una gran demanda a la cual no pueD. satisfacer.  Este es el motivo por el que solicita a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito D. 1500 nuevos soles para comprar más animales y el alimento balanceado D. estos.

Rafaela es una clienta antigua D. nuestra entidad que ha sabido invertir en su negocio y los préstamos concedidos la han llevado a un buen desarrollo D. su actividad. Este préstamo le permitirá conservar a su nueva clientela y por lo tanto seguir creciendo en su negocio.
texts.en:
Rafaela is an enterprising woman who is 53 years of age. She enjoys good personal references from her community. The community is dedicated to commerce, agriculture and farming, and it belongs to the province of Chiclayo. This is the Zana community.

Rafaela raises and sells poultry. She has an established clientele to whom she sells her livestock once they have reached an ideal size and weight. Due to the fact that Rafaela raises her poultry very well, she sees a great demand, one she cannot meet. This is the reason why she requests a loan from Edpyme Alternativa (Kiva Field Partner) in the amount of 1500 nuevos soles. She will purchase more livestock and balanced feed to feed them.

Rafaela is a long time client of our organization and she has known how to invest in her business. The loans that have been granted have helped her to develop her business. This loan will help her to capture new clients and to keep her business growing.

loans.use: to purchase poultry and balanced feed.

loans.name: Ana Adelina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “MAMA SIMONA”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Cusco, perteneciente a la provincia de Cusco,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Ana Adelina; ella tiene 20 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 1 hijo; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de tienda de abarrotes, ella vende productos de primera necesidad como arroz, azúcar, fideos, aceite entre otros productos, ella trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 10:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a su hijo, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de tienda de abarrotes. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar productos al por mayor para implementar la tienda de abarrotes.
                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                             
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Sra. Ana Adelina is a member of the Mama Simona Community Bank which is located in the district, province, and department of Cusco. She is 20 years old and lives with her partner and son. As well as her household duties, she runs a grocery store selling staples such as rice, sugar, pasta, oil etc. She works from 6am to 10pm.

Because of the income from the store, Ana can support her son. She wants to expand the business and increase stock. She will use the loan to buy products at wholesale prices.

Ana is very pleased to get a loan and promises to repay it.

loans.use: to buy stock at wholesale prices for her grocery store

loans.name: Sagrada Familia Group

texts.es:
Sagrada Familia es denominado el comité conformado por 11 mujeres de la ciudad de Caacupé. Ellas son amigas y vecinas de esa ciudad, que se organizaron ya que el programa de mujeres emprendedoras les gusto mucho.
Actualmente el comité se encuentra en el segundo ciclo. Manifiestan que trabajan muy bien todas juntas pues si surge algún imprevisto entre ellas, tratan de solucionarlo juntas, así el problema será menor.
La Señora Maria vende dulces, se dedica a esto hace ya un buen tiempo por lo que ya tiene una clientela definida. Personas de muchos lugares vienen a comprar de ella los productos que ofrece. Comenta que tiene mucha demanda, lo cual le es muy bueno por los ingresos que recibe. A ella le gustaría, en el futuro, poder tener una dulcería.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de los ingredientes para sus dulces, como ser azúcar, colorantes, polvos y demás. Desde ya agradece la oportunidad que tiene a la Fundación.
texts.en:
'Sagrada Familia' is the name of this committee which is made up of 11 women from the city of Caacupe.  They are friends and neighbors who live in this city and they formed a group as they really liked the Entrepreneurial Women Program.

The committee is currently in its second loan cycle.  The members say that they all work very well together and if any problem arises between the them, they try to solve it together in order to lessen it.

Maria sells sweet treats.  She has been in this business for quite some time.  People from many places come to buy her sweet treats.  She says that she has a lot of demand which is very good as it makes her good income.  In the future, she would like to be able to set up a confectionery store.

Maria is requesting this loan to buy ingredients for her sweet treats such as sugar, dyes, powders, etc.

loans.use: compra de azúcar, colorantes, saborizantes y demás.

loans.name: Karem Lisbeth

texts.es:
Karen Lisbeth tiene 20 años, Es soltera vive con la madre no tiene hijos, en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos. 

Los miembros de la V.R.C. TIERRA NUESTRA, se encuentra ubicada en el recinto San Luis de Zapotal, perteneciente al Cantón Ventanas, esta ventanilla se dedica a labores agrícolas de ciclo corto como siembre de maíz y arroz.

Karen se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y arroz. Compra sus productos en Comercial AGRIPAC y los vende en el mercado mayorista de Ventanas.

Solicita el crédito para sembrar maíz y arroz, compra de semillas y abonos de maiz y arroz.   Con el apoyo del crédito le ayudaría económicamente para suplir sus necesidades. Enfrenta desafíos como plagas en los cultivos y la falta de dinero para pagar a mas trabajadores. Su sueño es algun dia cultivar cacao y poner una fabrica de cafe.

Le gusta escuchar musica y bailar.
texts.en:
Karen Lisbeth is 20 years and single.  She doesn't have any children and lives with her mother in Ventanas canton, in Los Ríos province.

The 'Tierra Nuestra' (Our Land) community bank is located in San Luis de Zapotal, in Ventanas canton.  The members of this community bank work in short-cycle agriculture, growing crops such as corn and rice.

Karen is a farmer who grows corn and rice.  She buys her products in Comercial AGRIPAC and makes her sales in the wholesale market in Ventanas.

Karen is requesting this loan so that she can grow corn and rice.  She will buy seeds and manure.  The support of this loan will help her to financially meet her needs.  She faces challenges in her business such as pests and a lack of money to pay more workers.  Her dream is to some day grow cacao and set up a coffee factory.

Karen enjoys listening to music and dancing.

loans.use: to buy seeds and manure for her corn and rice crops

loans.name: Armel

texts.fr:
Commercant de 31 ans, marie avec 2 enfants a sa charge dont l'age varie entre 4 et 10 ans.En 2005, apres l'obtention de son Bac, n'ayant aucun soutien financier il se lance dans la vente des vivres frais et poisson de mer. Son etalage est situe dans un marche et vend en moyenne 50.000 a 75.000 frs par jour.
Il fait la vente en detail de la  viande de boeuf, queue de boeuf, ailes de dinde, ailes de poulet, cuisse de poulet, demi gros et la vente en detail .

A l'octroi de son pret , il va renforcer son stock des produits dont la demande est tres forte tel que  8 cartons de viandes tel que  de 10 kg de queue de boeuf, 5 cartons de viande arrieres et avant,2 cartons de  cuisse de poulets et 2 cartons d'ailes de poulets. 

Il est tres ambitieux, il a des enormes benefices , il epargne beaucoup parce qu'a l'avenir il veut ouvrir une chambre froide et aller s'approvisionner a Kinshasa  et Pointe Noire.
texts.en:
This customer is a 31-year old trader who is married with two children between four and ten years old in his care. After he passed his Baccalaureate exams in 2005, he did not have any financial support and so began selling food supplies and sea-fish. His stall is in a market and his turnover is around 50,000 to 75,000 francs a day. He sells on a retail and wholesale basis beef, oxtail, turkey wings, chicken wings and chicken legs.

Once he is granted his loan he is going to boost his stock with products that are in high demand such as: eight cartons of meat, ten kilograms of oxtail, five cartons of frontside and backside meat, two cartons of chicken legs and two cartons of chicken wings.

He is very ambitious and makes huge profits; he saves a lot because in the future he would like to open a cold storage room and go to Kinshasa and Pointe Noire to get his supplies.

loans.use: to buy cartons of beef, oxtail, chicken wings, turkey wings and cartons of chicken legs

loans.name: Maria Josefina

texts.es:
Josefina es una mujer de  41  años de edad. Es madre soltera y vive con sus 2 hijos en el distrito de Lambayeque. En una comunidad pequeña de gente emprendedora y trabajadora. 

Josefina se dedica, desde hace 5 años,  a la venta de pescado fresco. Esta actividad la realiza de manera ambulatoria (a través de una mototaxi) o en un pequeño puesto ubicado en su propio domicilio. Josefina cuenta con clientela establecida, que se siente contentan con el producto y servicio que ella brinda.

Josefina tiene muchos deseos de superación y desea invertir en un segundo negocio.
